48b1(ngi): phas kyi rigs kyi dam tshig ni// tso gyis dug lnga dag byed pa'o// rigs lnga dril te dug lnga sman du sgyur ba'o// yang na 'di ltar shes par bya// gzugs dang nam mkha'
48b2(ngi): sku la sogs// rnam snang yab yum bde gshegs lha'o// tshor ba chu dang yon tan sogs// 'byung ldan yab yum rin chen lha'o// 'du shes me dang gsung la sogs/
48b3(ngi): snang ba mtha' yas yab yum lha'o// 'du byed rlung dang 'phrin las sogs// don yod yab yum 'khor gyi lha'o// rnam shes dang thugs la sogs// mi 'khrugs yab
48b4(ngi): yum 'khor gyi lha'o// gzhan yang bsrung bar bya ba ni// rtsa ba sku gsung thugs dang ni// mi spang ba dang dang du blang // spyad pa'i dam tshig bco lnga bsrung // de yang ma hAs
48b5(ngi): ma ya/ bzhi po rdzogs pa kun tu bzang // kun bzang man ngag shes gyur nas// dam tshig thams cad de ru rdzogs// ma bsrungs pa ni gcig kyang med// ces gsungs
48b6(ngi): so// dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po'i rgyud las/ dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang byang chub sems dpa'
48b7(ngi): phyag na rdo rje dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nu dang / lnga dang / klu dang / mi'i rigs 'dzim 'bum phran gis/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po kun rig chos
49a1(ngi): kyi rje dpal bde ba chen po/ shri he ru ka/ ti ra ma ti/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po la bstod pa/ e ma sangs rgyas kun tu bzang // gsang chen
49a2(ngi): thig le nyid la rdzogs// ma rig mun se la ye shes sgron// dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod do// mngon par bstod do// de nas kun yi rangs te/
49a3(ngi): gsang sngags bla na med pa'i don thugs su chud nas/ zhab sa la spyi bos blangs shing rang rang gi sa la gshegs so// lha dang mi rnams kyi bka' rgyud dam pa/ spyi bos
49a4(ngi): blangs shing chom bu'i dkyil 'khor dam pa/ dngos grub nye bar bsgrubs pas/ 'bras bu sangs rgyas kyi sa la mngon du gshegs so// dngos grub chen po nye ba'i
49a5(ngi): snying po'i rgyud las gzhug bstod pa dang / gtad pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // dngos grub nye ba'i snying po'i rgyud rdzogs so//
49a6(ngi): dngos grub mchog skyems ya mtshan chen po'i bka'// thabs chen bla na med pa gsang sngags 'bras bu'i chos// kun gyi thun mong ma yin tha med man ngag rgyud// tshig
49a7(ngi): don rig pa bla yang don gnyis rtogs par bka'// bka' rgyud dam pa'i man ngag bla med 'di lta bu// bdag 'dra bim la'i man ngag dam pa'i di yin te// dri med zla shar
49b1(ngi): yi dam chos su gtad kyis thub par chongs// dri med zla shar yi dam man ngag dam pa 'di// yang dbang gnyer la gtad kyis bdud rtsi ste// legs pa'i sgron me yi ma
49b2(ngi): nar mar gtad// sa ma ya kha tham/ rgyud du ma bu gsum pa/ lung bam po brgyad/ man ngag dngos grub nye ba'i snying po'i rgyud gsum ni/ sru legs pa'i sgo na ma
49b3(ngi): la ga tad do// rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ a mr-i ta kun Da li a mar A yu tan+t+ra na ma/ bod skad du/ bdud
49b4(ngi): rtsi 'khyil pa 'chi med tshe'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
49b5(ngi): dus gcig na/ bcomamo ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa sku dang bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad la longs spyod pa'i bdag
49b6(ngi): po chen po de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje snying po chen po rdo rje btsun mo'i pad+mo la bzhugs so// de
49b7(ngi): nyid la stsogs pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sogs pa
50a1(ngi): rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// da'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen brngan chos rang gi rgyun
50a2(ngi): las bzhengs nas/ khams gsum gyi sems can ma lus pa rnams la thugs rje chen pos gzigs te/ 'di skad ces gsol ba 'debs so// bcom ldan mgon du
50a3(ngi): dpag med// srid pa gsum gyi sems can rnams// tshoni nyams byed rgyu dang rkyen// tshe nyams pa yi rtags dang ni// tshe cho ga mkhan po'i mtshan nyid dang // tshe
50a4(ngi): chog bya ba'i thabs rnams ni// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// zhes nus pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dam can
50a5(ngi): yi chad sngags pas sems dkrugs dang // zhe sdang drug po'i tshod gtong babs pa dang // rtsa bsku gsung thugs kyi mnyams dang // gnas med gnas bcas gyur
50a6(ngi): ba 'di rnams ni// tshe srog nyams par byed pa'i rgyu lon no// tshe lar dbugs sngags bgegs kyi dbang du 'gyur// tshe srog nyams par byed pa'i rkyen yin no
50a7(ngi): 'khor la khro zhing sdug sad 'byin pa dang // bzhin 'gyur skyong la mtshal par gyur bar myod// slobang pona'i ma byang dus pas g.yel ba dang // khabs dag kyang ming
50b1(ngi): khar mi yong rnams// 'gro ba gang la 'di dang ldan gyur na// de ni tshe nyams pa yi rtags yin no// tshe chog byed pa'i slob dpon mtshan nyid gsum// ting 'dzin phra
50b2(ngi): mo las su rung ba dang // rgyud kyi don la mkhas shing dbang thob pa// mthu byin che zhing dam chen nye ba gsum// 'di gsum gang gis 'gugs kyang khugs par 'gyur//
50b3(ngi): mi mchog bla ma de la tshe srungs zhus// tshe cho ga bya ba'i thabs kyi rim pa ni// bcud len sman gyis tshe rnams bsring ba dang // yi dam sngags kyis tshe srogs dgug pa dang //
50b4(ngi): bza' ba tung longs spyod tshe yi cho ga dang // longs spyod tshogs kyi tshe bsgrub chen mo dang // gsang ba dag pa'i rdzas la tshe sgrub cing // mkha' dbyings dag pa'i yum la tshe
50b5(ngi): bsgrub bya// 'di rnams gang gis tshe srog nyams pa 'tsho// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi dang gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste
50b6(ngi): dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe nyams par byed pa'i rgyu rkyen 'di gsungs so// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'i dam can rnams// lo dang
50b7(ngi): zla bar mchod pa'i dam bca' nyams// pra ti ha na dus kyi mchod pa chag// chos skyong bsrung ma ma lus yi chad nas// cho 'phrul mi sdug ston pa yid kyang dngangs// dkon
51a1(ngi): cog sri zhu 'khor dang bcas padang // yon tan mgron gyi dpal ldan mgon po dang // lan chags stsogs pa'i bgegs rigs sde brgyad dang /
51a2(ngi): snying rje'i mgron gyur rigs drug sems can la// mchod sbyin ma gtang bsrung ma ma dgyes pas// rang sems 'khrul pas lus ngag sems nang ldan// dge 'dun rnam gnyis
51a3(ngi): longs spyod srog la rgol// dam chen bsrung ma lha srin ma lus rnams// bsgral ba'i zhing gyur de la rbang byas pas// dus min 'chi bar byed pa'i bar chang yin// rmi
51a4(ngi): dam rang gi srog ltar 'khur ba dang // lus ngag yid kyis bla ma mched zhabs 'degs// sngags dang phyag rgya bar du mi gcod cing // gsang ba'i man ngag snod ngan mi
51a5(ngi): spel la/ sbyor sgrol la sogs spyad par bya ba dang // bdud rtsi rnam lnga dang du len byed cing // nyon mongs ye shes ye nas mi spong ste// rigs lnga bsgrub par dam
51a6(ngi): can de rnams dor// de dag tshe srog nyams par byed pas na// 'di bzhin skye bo sa ma byed rnal 'byor tshogs// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'chi med
51a7(ngi): tshe'i rgyud las// tshe nyams par byed pa'i rgyu bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe nyams pa'i rtags 'di gsungs
51b1(ngi): so// gang zhig bgegs kyi dbang du gyur pas ni// pha mas bsdus pa'i dbun zla sring mo dang // lus las chad pa'i bu dang bu mo dang // srid pas 'brel ba'i
51b2(ngi): bud med gzung ma dang // dus kyis bsdus pa'i pha tshan mes po bgos// lus ngag yid kyis khro bar byed pa dang // sngon las mi shes sngon las rjod byed cing //
51b3(ngi): de lta'i spyod pa cung zad dka' bar lta// phyi mar gar skye'i 'bras bu mi shes par// da lta'i lus 'di 'dor bar sdug skad 'byin// lus kyi mdog nyams dngas ma
51b4(ngi): bros pa dang // byad kyi bzhin 'gyur bkrag mdangs shor nas ni// ngag gi tshi ga ngan smra la dga' bar byed// lus kyi spyod lam dran pa mi gsal te// 'du ba'i nang
51b5(ngi): kyis lus la zin pa na// 'tsho byed sman pa dus su mi khugs shing // bla ma bsod nam sa che ba gzhan du shor// lus kyi stobs med kha zas yid mi 'ong // pho ba'i me
51b6(ngi): drod nyams pas 'ju stobs zhan// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ tshe nyams pa'i rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// /
51b7(ngi): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe chog byed pa'i slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa 'di dag gsungs so// yi dam gsal zhing bsnyen pa theb pa yis/
52a1(ngi): drod rtags phra mo'i nus pa bstan pa dang // dmigs med de bzhin nyid la blo gtad bas// stong nyid phra mo rgyud la shar ba dang // rgyud don
52a2(ngi): thugs la gsal bar mkhyen pa yis// cho ga yan lag kun la mkhas pa dang // bum dbang lus la thob pas byin dang ldan// lus kyi rtsa rnams bskyed rim lha skur shes//
52a3(ngi): gsang dbang ngag la bskur ba sa sngags dang ldan// bzlas pa'i thebs la shin tu gus pa dang // shes rab yo byad yi de la gnas pa yi// khams kyi bdud rtsi lhan skyes
52a4(ngi): ye shes myong // bde chen dbang gi snying po rlung la goms// gzung mi'i mkha' nas byang sems rang la sdu// lus ngag yid rnams dag phyir dbang rnams thob// dbang
52a5(ngi): rdzogs rgyud mkhyen yan lag ldan pa yis// mthu dang byin rlab sa ngang gis che ba yin// ti ma gang du shar bar mun pa sel// yon tan de lda na dam can bsrung ma nye// 'di
52a6(ngi): ldan bla ma'i mtshan nyid yod pa de// phyir yi bla mas sgro 'dogs yongs su gcod// nang gi bla mas rang 'byung ye shes shar// gsang ba'i bla mas lhan skyes cig pa ston//
52a7(ngi): de nyid bla ma'i chos rnams shin tu dag/ 'di yis tshe rnams khugs par the tshom bral// gang nyams skyes bus brtson 'grus rab bskyed nas// bla ma'ong la tshe cho ga myur du
52b1(ngi): zhus// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba 'chi mang tshe'i rgyud las tshe chog byed pa'i mkhan po bla ma bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas
52b2(ngi): bcom ldan 'das kyis bcud len sman gyis tshe bsring ba gsungs so// gang zhig bcud len sman gyis tshe rnams bsring // shing gi 'bras bu dag la brten pa dang // rdo yi bcud
52b3(ngi): la brten nas blang bya dang // rtsi'i rtsa ba rnams su sbyar ba dang // sha yi rigs kyis ro rnams rtsa bya zhing // sa yi zhag rnams zas su za byed cing // chu yi rigs rnams skom
52b4(ngi): du btung bar bya// 'byung ba'i ro rnams ldan pa a ru ra// nus pa'i bcud ldan sman mchog ba ru ra// tsha ba'i nad sel grang 'joms skyu ru ra// rgya ma lnga
52b5(ngi): bcu chu yi nang du spangs// khu ba btsags nas 'bri mar bzang po dang // 'o ma chu dang bcas nas bsdus pa yis// sman mar rten na skra dkar gnyer ma med pa dang // tshe ring lus ni
52b6(ngi): shin tu bde bar byed// 'du ba'i nad kyis mi 'jigs tshe yang brtan// 'bras bu gsum gyi bcud len mi rnams spyod// tsong zhi ma yis pa zhu ba'i phye ma dang //
52b7(ngi): brag zhun chu yis bzhu ba'i khu ba dang // bu ram sbyar la rtag tu zas su bza'// nad rnams 'joms shing nas kha shin tu sra// rab rtse nya shing ra shag rtsa
53a1(ngi): dang // kA shro kan d+ha'i rtsa ba gze ma dang // lbu ba'i rtsa ba rnams ni cha bsnyams te// mar dang 'o mchur sbyar tshos par bya// mar gyi bcud 'phel
53a2(ngi): 'o mas sna ring ngo // chu yis sna mi 'tshig ste khong tshos so// dkrugs pas 'ju sla mkhas pas sbyar bar bya// rtsa ba lnga yi sman mar nad rnams sel// rgas pa sral lus kyi
53a3(ngi): nyams stobs 'phel// tshe srog brtan par byed de nyams su blang // dpyid sha dang rtsangs sbal mchil pa'i sha// sbrul gyi sha dang dbang po lag pa
53a4(ngi): dang // bu ram sbrang rtsi cong zhi rab sbyar zlos// rgas pa ro rtsa lus kyi zungs rnams rgyas// mig rno gzhon pa'i lus dang 'dra bar byed// tshe yi cho ga yin phyir
53a5(ngi): dang du blangs// sa yi zhag rnams zas su za byed na// dang po sa sa bdag klu ga nyan med pas nas// sbyin la bzang zhing snum pa'i sa rigs
53a6(ngi): nas// gtor ma byin la yid btags sogs la blang // bdag por snang ba rnams la zhu bar bya// chang ngam chu la sbyar te btung ba yang // khro bo dkar po ral
53a7(ngi): gri thod pa 'dzin// bsgoms nas bdud rtsir byin brlabs bza' bar bya// log na bul tog sa zhag bsres la bza'// chang zhim lho ru btung bar bya ba yin//
53b1(ngi): pha yi lha mo tshe yi bdag mo yin/ kha sgrub pa'i man ngag tshe yi cho gar gsungs// chu yi rigs rnams skom du btung ba yin// dang po nas bsdus
53b2(ngi): ba btung bar bya// khams log byung na bu ra ma mur bar bya// de nas pa tshwa med pa'i chu bzangs la/ bskol grangs byas te mang du 'thungs pa yis// srin gyi rigs rnams
53b3(ngi): phyi ru thon pa dang // khams log byung na ru sa khu bzang po btang // 'byongs par gyur nas rtag tu chu grang btung // 'dis ni sa bdag klu gnyan ma lus pa'i// tshe yi bar
53b4(ngi): chad sel bar byed pa yin// chu ba sgom bzang po rnal 'byor pa yis bya// de la bcud len rigs kyi sngags 'di gsungs// oM a rbaM wa hriM/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-ita
53b5(ngi): hU hri/ A yu dz+nyA na puN+ye swA hA/ bdud rtsi 'khyil ba 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ bcud len sman gyis tshe ba sring ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//
53b6(ngi): nas bcom lda ni 'das kyis yi dam sngags kyis tshe srog 'gugs pa 'di gsungs so// tshe srog brtan pa'i yo ma sngags bsgrub 'di// tshe ba sring nad sel rgyal po yin
53b7(ngi): bar gsungs// dang po tshe srog brtan byed sdong nyid las// tshe dpag med pa mdog dkar rang nyid bsam// g.yas pa sa gamon g.yon pa ma nya ma ga zhag steng /
54a1(ngi): yi bum pa rab tu bzhag pa la// yi ge Ne ni tshe yi rang bzhin can// 'od 'phros bkug nas rang la bstim par bya// na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a
54a2(ngi): pa ra mai te A yur+dz+dza na su bi ni tsit+yA te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te sa mya ka saM bud+d+ha ya/ ha d+ya tha/ o sarba sang skA ri pa ri shu d+h+yA d+harma te ga ga na sa mung ga te/ swa b+hA
54a3(ngi): wa bi shud d+he ma hA ya na pa ri wA re swA hA/ zhag re la ni brgya rtsa bzlas// tshe srog bar chad med par 'gyur// tshe ring nad sel thugs dam ni// nang bar nyi ma sha ra ba'i
54a4(ngi): dus/ shar gyi phyogs su kha bltas la// nam mkha' zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// tshe dpag med pa mdog dkar zhing // phyag gi bdud rtsi'i lhung bzed nas//
54a5(ngi): 'chi med bdud rtsis 'gro sbyin gtong // bsil byed kha bcad skyil krung bzhugs// bdag gis mchod de gsol ba gdab// hUtashar phyogs mngon par dga' ba
54a6(ngi): na/ tshe dang ye shes bdag po khyed// bdud rtsi lhung bzed kha phye nas// bsil byed 'bar ba rin chen nas// bden pa bzhi rtags chu bo phob// bdag la tshe dbang
54a7(ngi): bskur du gsol// tshe dang bsod nams rgyas par mdzod// dus 'dir bdag la bdud rtsi phob// ces pas sna yi rlung gis ni// bdud rtsi bsil byed las drangs
54b1(ngi): nas/ bdag la 'bebs pa'i gsang sngags 'di// brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o// d+hu su so sa ra ha ka ri sha re hU~M phaT/ 'du ba bzhi yi nad rnams dang /
54b2(ngi): bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu'i gdon// thams cad ma lus sel bar byed// de phyir rang gi dri chu ni// 'khyor bar blags la sngags ba ta ba ba tung // o a mA ra
54b3(ngi): Nadzi wa na tri ye swA hA/ zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las yi dam sngags kyis tshe brtan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// /
54b4(ngi): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bza' btung longs spyod tshe'i cho ga 'di gsungs so// nyin gcig pa dang gzhan gyi kha bskongs la// bza' btung longs spyod tshe yi cho ga yin//
54b5(ngi): nyin gcig pa'i tshe'i cho ga'i gzhung // pad+ma 'dab brgyad dkyil 'khor ba zhengs su gsol// tshe bum byin brlabs mtshams bcad cing // tshe skye mas lham zhing tshe 'bras
54b6(ngi): brtsal// dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs su gsol// b+hU las bum pa gzhal yas khang // mkhas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang // a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom
54b7(ngi): a yi 'phro 'dus sngags brjod la// bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// g.yas dkar g.yon sdo dbus dmar ba// pad+ma rdo rje rin chen
55a1(ngi): g.yas/ dril bu 'khor lo ral gri g.yon// thugs khar hri da mar rta mgrin skra// zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog dmar// g.yas g.yon rdo rje
55a2(ngi): pad+ma bsnams// mtha' gnyis mda' gzhu rnam par 'dzin// dkar dang dmar dang sngo ba'i zhal// khams gsum dbang du sdud pa'o// bru badz+ra pad+ma bi sha b+h+yAM/ ma sUr+ya
55a3(ngi): maN+Da la bru/ a tsaN+DA maN+Da la la a/ baM pad+ma maN+Da la la paM/ sang+ga ra na phaT/ saM ha ra na hU/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ o AHhU/ yu ma chen go sa da kar sku la 'khyil// de
55a4(ngi): bzhin rdo rje rin chen dang // las mchog yum chen pad+ma la// pho nya bzhi dang sgom bzhi// zhing khams sgo la bsgom par bya// tshe bskyed pa la rnam pa gnyis// zhi ba ye
55a5(ngi): shes tshe dang ni// rol pa khro bo'i tshe bskyed do// tshe dgug pa la rnam pa gnyis// 'byung ba chen po lnga yi tshe// 'bras bu byang chub sems kyi tshe// bstim pa lus kyi
55a6(ngi): gnas kyu ru// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // 'phrin las lnga yi tshe bstim mo// hU nub phyogs pad+ma dbang gi zhing khams na// bcom ldan mgon po gsung
55a7(ngi): mchog tshe dpag med// thugs kyi zla kham shel gyi ga'u nas// byang chub sems kyi tshe mchog a yuHdmar po ni// rtse gcig bdag gis bsgrub pa'i tshe lags na//
55b1(ngi): byin gyis rlob cing tshe yi dngos grub stsa la du gsol// oM b+hu bu d+d+ha A yu she hUM aHpU bruM badz+ra A yu she hUM aHswab+hA rat+na A yu she hUM aHoM b+h+rUM pad+ma A yu she hU a
55b2(ngi): hab+h+ru karma A yu she hU a/ sU/ pad+ma ge sar stong ldan pa'i// dbus kyi rA ga dmar ba 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan sku mchog mgon po rnam snang mdzad//
55b3(ngi): thugs ka'i dpal be'u lam gsang ga'u nas// oM dkar gsal ba'i 'phro 'du las// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas//
55b4(ngi): gti mug chen po'i dug bcom ste// gu ya gsang ba'i byang chub sems// rdo rje tshe ru rab tu bsgoms// oM b+hu bud d+ha A yu she hUM/ a hUM pad+ma gau sar stong ldan pa'i// shar
55b5(ngi): phyogs ye shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan thugs mchog mgon po rdo rje sems// thugs kha'i dpal be'u zla gsang ga'u nas// hUM sngon gsal ba'i
55b6(ngi): 'phro 'du las// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// zhe sdang chen po'i dug bcom ste// gu ya gsang ba'i byang chub sems// rdza
55b7(ngi): rje'i tshe nu rab tu bsgoms// g+hu b+h+rUM bud+ha a yu she hU A/ sU / pad+ma ge sar stong ldan pa'i// lho phyogs ye shes men mo rjid dkyil la khor nas// bcom ldan yon tan mgon
56a1(ngi): rin chen 'byung // thugs ka'i dpal be'u zla gsang ga'u nas// swa ser gsal ba'i 'phro 'du las// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis//
56a2(ngi): 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// nga rgyal chen po'i dug bcom ste// gu ya gsang ba'i byang chub sems// rdo rje'i tshe ru rab tu bsgoms// swa b+hU rat+na a yu she sU sa/
56a3(ngi): hUMpad+ma ge sar stong ldan pa'i// nub phyogs ye shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan gsung mchog mgon po tshe dpag med// thugs ka'i dpal be'u zla
56a4(ngi): gsang ga'u nas// aM dmar gsal ba'i 'phro 'du las// so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// 'dod chags chen po'i
56a5(ngi): dug bcom ste// gu ya gsang ba'i byang chub sems// rdo rje tshe ru rab tu bsgoms// a b+h+rUM pad+ma a yu she hU a/ hUM/ pad+ma ge sar stong ldan pa'i// byang phyogs ye
56a6(ngi): shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan 'phrin las mgon po don yod grub// thug so ki'i dpal be'u zla gsang ga'u nas// ha ljang gsal ba'i 'phro 'du las//
56a7(ngi): bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// phrag dog chen po'i dug bcom ste// g+hu la gsang ba'i byang chub sems// rdo rje tshe ru rab tu
56b1(ngi): bsgoms// pa bruM karma a yu she hUM aHhU/ 'byung ba sha yi khams nas tshe nyams na// sa yi khams nas dgug par bya// dus gsum
56b2(ngi): rgyal ba'i yum mchog sangs rgyas spyan// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// 'byung ba sa yi khams rnams kun// gsang ba'i tshe ru byin brlabs nas// sha
56b3(ngi): yi khams su bstim par bya// la b+hU badz+ra a yu she hUM a/ hUM/ 'byung ba khrag gi khams nas tshe nyams na// chu yi khams nas dgug par bya// dus gsum
56b4(ngi): rgyal ba'i yum mchog mA ma ki/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na sa// 'byung ba chu yi khams rnams kun// gsang ba'i tshe ru byin brlabs nas// khrag gi
56b5(ngi): khams su bstim par bya// ma b+hA ra tA a yu she hU aH/ hU 'byung ba drod kyi khams nas tshe nyams na// me yi khams nus dgug par bya// dus gsum rgyal
56b6(ngi): ba'i yum mchog na bza' dkar// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// 'byung ba me yi khams rnams kun// gsang ba'i tshe ru byin brlabs nas// drod kyi khams
56b7(ngi): su bstim par bya// baM b+hU pad+ma a yu ne hAM a/ hA 'byung ba dbugs kyi khams nas tshe nyams na// rlung gi khams nas dgug par bya// dus gsum rgyal ba'i
57a1(ngi): yum mchog dam tshig sgrol// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// 'byung ba rlung gi khams rnams kun// gsang ba'i tshe ru byin brlabs
57a2(ngi): nas/ dbugs kyi khams su bstim par bya// ta bru karma a yu shaM hU a hU/ rnam shes yid kyi khams nas tshe nyams na// nam mkha'i khams nas
57a3(ngi): dgug par bya// dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum mchog kun tu bzang // 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// 'byung ba nam mkha'i khams rnams kun// gsang ba'i
57a4(ngi): tshe ru byin brlabs nas// yid kyi khams su bstim par bya// mu bru bud d+ha a yuHshe hU a/ hU shar phyogs dkar po shel gyi zhing khams nas// dkar mo
57a5(ngi): mgyogs ma zhi byed 'od 'phro'i tshogs// phyag na tshe yi ge yab dar dkar po bsnams// tshe dang ye shes 'gugs pa'i les mdzad ma// dpal dang gzi brjid 'dren pa'i
57a6(ngi): las mdzod cig/ shar phyogs dri za'i lag nas tshe drongs la// rdo rje tshe mchog 'gugs pa'i las mdzad cig/ badz+ra a yu she a gu sha dzaHhU/ lho phyogs pa
57a7(ngi): rgyurma yi zhing khams nas// sngon mo mgyogs ma rgyas byed 'od 'phro'i tshogs// phyag na tshe yi g.ya ba dar sngon po bsnams// tshe dang ye shes 'gugs pa'i las mdzad ma/
57b1(ngi): dpal dang gze brjod 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ lho phyogs gshin rje'i lag nas tshe drongs la// rin chen tshe mchog 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ rat+na a yu she
57b2(ngi): pA sha hU/ hU nub phyogs pad+ma rA ga'i zhing khams nas// dmar mo mgyogs ma dbang byed 'od 'phro'i tshogs// phyag ni tsha yi g.yab dar dmar po bsnams// tshe
57b3(ngi): dang ye shes 'gugs pa'i las mdzad ma// dpal dang gzi brjid 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ nub phyogs klu dbang lag nas tshe drongs la// pad+ma tshe mchog 'gugs
57b4(ngi): pa'i las mdzod cig/ pad+ma a yu she slo Ta ba/ hU/ byang phyogs in tra nI li zhing khams nas// ljang khu mgyogs ma drag byed 'od 'phro'i tshogs// phyag na tshe
57b5(ngi): yi g.ya ba dar ljang khu bsnams// tshe dang ye shes 'gugs pa'i las mdzad ma// dpal dang gzi brjid 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ byang phyogs gnod sbyin lag nas
57b6(ngi): tshe drongs la// las kyi tshe mchog 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ karma a yu she g+ha na d+he ho// hU/ khams gsum gnas nas tshe 'gugs ma// rdo rje lha mo lcags
57b7(ngi): kyu ma/ kha pur shel gyi mdog 'dram// phyag na tshe yi bum pa bsnam sa// gcig las bye ba 'bud du sprul// yang glul lha mo mang po yis// drongs shig rdo rje
58a1(ngi): drongs shig/ kha d+ha ro tsi dzaH/ hU/ srid gsum gnas nas tshe 'gugs ma// rin chen lha mo zhags pa ma// be DUR+Ya yi mdog 'dra ma/
58a2(ngi): phyag na rin chen bum pa bsnams// gcig las bye ba 'bum du sprul// yang sbrul lha mo mang po yis// drongs shig rin chen tshe drongs shig/ du bi ni tsu hU/
58a3(ngi): stong gsum gnas nas tshe dgugs ma// pad+ma'i lha mo lcags sgrog ma// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ma// phyag na pad+ma'i bum pa bsnams// gcig las bye ba bum du
58a4(ngi): sprul// yang sbrul lha mo mang po yis// drongs shig pad+ma'i tshe drongs shig/ DA ki ni ba baM/ hUM/ 'jig rten gsum nas tshe 'gugs ma// las kyi lha mo dril bum/
58a5(ngi): phyog na zla ba'i dril bu bsnams// gcig las bye ba 'bum du sgra la// yang sbrul lha mo mang po yis// drongs shig las kyi tshe drongs shig/ sa ma ya ho ho/ oM badz+ra
58a6(ngi): ang+gu sha dza/ badz+ra pa sha hU/ badz+ra s+pho ta ba/ badz+ra ga na d+he hoH/ hUM/ chos la mnga' mdzad pad+ma'i rgyal// sbyi nas dbang bskur bcom ldan 'das// phung po lnga yi tshe nyams na/
58a7(ngi): phyag rgya chen po yab kyis khug/ 'byung ba lnga yi tshe nyams na// shes rab lha mo yum gyis khug/ khams dang skye mched tshe nyams na// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis
58b1(ngi): khug/ hU/ rdo rje khyung ge gshog stobs las// rgya mtsho chen po'i gting nas dkrugs// gnam lcags thog gi cher pho ba la// srid pa'i ri bo rmang nas shig/ rdo rje mtshon
58b2(ngi): cha'i char pho ba la// bar chod 'byung po rdul du lhogs// dzaHhU ba hoHtikyA muk+ta badz+ra a yu she a/ de nas tshe bum lag tu ga ta da// hUnam mkha'i khams na sa ma gcig
58b3(ngi): tshe 'dzin ma// de bzhin rigs kyi yum ste tshe 'dzin ma// sku mdag btsom gser gyi mdog 'dra ma// phyag na rin chen gser gyi bum pa bsnams// yon bdag tshe dang
58b4(ngi): bdud rtsis bltams nas kyang // 'khor lo rtsib sa brgyad 'bar ba'i rgyas 'debs shing // tshe 'di bcol lo che dang srog gnyis brtan// tshe bzung srog skyobs dbang bskur byin
58b5(ngi): gyis rlobs// d+hA tu shwa ri che b+hU/ rU/ shar gyi phyogs nas ma gcig tshe 'dzin ma// rdo rje rigs kyi yum ste sangs rgyas spyan// sku mdog ga pur shel gyi mdog 'dra ma//
58b6(ngi): phyag na rin chen shel dkar bum pa bsnams// yin bdag tshe dang bdud rtsis bltams nas kyang // rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar ba'i rgyas 'debs shing // tshe 'di bcol lo tshe dang srog
58b7(ngi): gnyis brtan// tshe bzung srog skyobs dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs// dwe ba ra ti tshe b+h+rUM/ lho mi phyogs rnam ma gcig tshe 'dzin ma// rin chen rigs kyi yum ste ma ma ki/ sku
59a1(ngi): mdog bai DUR+Ya yi mdog 'dra ma// phyag na bai DUR+Ya yi bum pa bsnams// yon bdag tshe dang bdud rtsis bltams nas kyang // rin chen zur brgyad 'bar
59a2(ngi): ba'i rgyas 'debs shing // tshe 'od btsal lo tsho dang sro gnyis brtan// tshe bzung srog skyobs dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs// mo ha ra ti tshe dru/ hU nub kyi phyogs nas ma
59a3(ngi): gcig tshe 'dzin ma// pad+ma rigs kyi yum ste na bza' dkar// sku mdog pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ma// phyag na pad+ma rA ga'i bum pa bsnams// yon bdag tshe dang bdud
59a4(ngi): rtsis bltams nas kyang // pad+ma 'dab brgyad 'bar ba'i rgyas 'debs shing // tshe 'di becol lo tshe dang srog 'di brtan// tshe bzung srog skyobs dbang bskur byin gyis rlo bas//
59a5(ngi): ra ga ra ti tshe b+hU/ hUbyang gi phyogs nas ma gcig tshe 'dzin ma// las kyi rigs kyi yum ste dam tshig sgrol// sku mdog in+d+ra nI la'i mdog 'dra ma// phyag na in+d+ra nI la'i
59a6(ngi): bum pa bsnams// yon bdag tshe dang bdud rtsis bltams nas kyang // rdo rje rgya gram 'bar ba'i rgyas 'dabs shing // tshe 'di bcol lo tsho dang srog 'di brtan// tshe bzung
59a7(ngi): srog skyobs dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs// ta ma badz+ra ra te tshe bru/ hUM spyi gtsug zla ba'i dkyil 'khor na// bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs// kun tu bzang dang
59b1(ngi): gnyis med pa'i// de yi mthu dang byin rlabs kyis// tshe 'di rab tu brtan gyur cig/ dbang yang rab tu thob gyur cig/ srog kyang rab tu brtan gyur cig/ tshe dbang phun
59b2(ngi): sum tshogs gyur cig/ oM bud+d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa au/ a ljags stengs pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// bcom ldan snang ba mtha' yas bzhugs// na bza' dkar dang ga nyis su
59b3(ngi): med// de yi mthu dang byin rlabs kyis// tshe 'di rab tu brtan gyur cig/ dbang yang rab tu thob gyur cig/ srog kyang rab tu brtan gyur cig/ tshe dbang phun sum
59b4(ngi): tshogs gyur cig/ aM pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsA aM/ hUM / thugs ka nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor na// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs// sangs rgyas spyan dang gnyis su med//
59b5(ngi): de yi mthu dang byin rlabs kyis// tshe 'di rab tu brtan gyur cig/ dbang yang rab tu thob gyur cig/ srog kyang rab tu brtan gyur cig/ tshe dbang phun sum tshogs gyur cig
59b6(ngi): hUM badz+ra a b+hi Shi Sh+ya hUM/ hUM lte ba ri ni chen zur brgya la// bcom ldan ri ni chen 'byung ldan bzhugs// mA ma ki dang gnyis su med// de yi mthu dang byin rlabs kyis//
59b7(ngi): tshe 'di rab tu brtan myur cig/ dbang yang rab tu tho ba myur rtsig/ srog kyang rag tu brtan gyur cig/ tshe dbang phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ sA rat+na a b+hi Shany+tsi tra/ gsang
60a1(ngi): ba rdo rje ral gril// bcom ldan don yod grub pa bzhugs// dam tshig sgrol dang gnyis su med// de yi mthu dang byin rlabs kyis// tshe 'di
60a2(ngi): rab tu brtan gyur cig/ dbang yang rab tu thob gyur cig/ srog kyang rab tu brtan gyur cig/ tshe dbang phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ ha karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ hU/ bskyed
60a3(ngi): ba sa mi nub rgyal mtshan te// bcings pas 'brel med rdo rje lu gu rgyud// brtan pas mi g.yo ri reb lhun po ste// spros pa med pas khams gsum bkrag dang ldan//
60a4(ngi): skal ldan tshe yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// mi nub rgyal mtshan tshe ni spyi bo'i gtsug tu bstim// ljags stengs pad+ma'i tshe ni zhal gyi nang du bstim// skye shi med pa'i tshe
60a5(ngi): ni thugs kyi dkyil du ba stim// 'chi med rdo rje'i tshe ni khog pa'i dbugs la bstim// 'du 'bral med pa'i tshe ni lte ba'i dkyil du bstim// mi 'gyur g.yung drung tshe ni
60a6(ngi): dpral ba'i dbyings su bstim// mi ldog rdo rje'i tshe ni rkang pa'i mthil du bstim// tshe 'di sa la nyams na zan la bstim// tshu la nyams na chang la bstim// rdol nyams
60a7(ngi): na snod la bstim// me la nyams na drod la bstim// shing la nyams na mda' la bstim// rus la nyams na mde'u la bstim// rlung la nyams na sgro la bstim// mdangs
60b1(ngi): la nyams na dar la bstim// smyug ma sku yi phyag rgya dang bsrings la// mnga' stong gsung gi phyag rgyar dpangs stod cig/ mde'u rtse thugs kyi phyag rgyar ngar thogs shig/
60b2(ngi): 'chi med tshe yi dngos grub stsa la du gsol// oM ru ru su ru dza la tiSh+Tha sid+d+hi lo ts+tsha na sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni badz+ra aM yu she hU aH/ hUM/ gcig pa rtse gcig thugs kyi rgyu/
60b3(ngi): gnyis pa thabs dang shes rab rgya// gsum pa sku gsung thugs kyi rgya// bzhi pa gar mkhan mchog gi rgya// lnga pa ye shes lnga yi rgya// drug pa rta mchog dbang
60b4(ngi): gir+b+ha/ bdun pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu// chos kyi dbyings su tsho sbas pas// dus gsum rgyal ba dgrar langs kyang // de la babyung zhing brtag tu med// de la
60b5(ngi): ba sad cing bzung du med// de la de bri zhing bskol du med// gzugs med lha mo bzhi yis rgyas gdab bo// 'di la che yi dpal bskyed do// 'di la srog gi mdangs
60b6(ngi): gsol lo// tshe dbang gsol cig srog kyang skyobs// dbang chen sku la byin phob cig/ a yu dz+nyA na b+hU b+hU/ de nas smon lam gdab pa ni/ na mo dus
60b7(ngi): sum rgyal ba kun gyi dbang bskur ba'i// bcom ldan mgon po ye shes tshe dpag med// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs che gsum 'dis// rin chen gzhal
61a1(ngi): las khang la grub par shog/ rgyal ba yab yum rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yi// ye shes lnga yi byin rlabs tshe bum 'dis// skye med sku gsum
61a2(ngi): thugs su grub par shog/ bkra shis lha mo rnams kyis byin brlabs pas// bkra shis rdzas brgyad dngos su tshang bar shog/ thugs kyi dpal be'u lta bur byin brlabs pas/
61a3(ngi): skye med ye shes lta bur grub par shog/ phyag mtshan rdo rje lta bur byin brlabs pas// 'chi med rdo rje lta bur grub par shog/ bla med sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs pas// mi
61a4(ngi): 'gyur g.yung drung lta bur thob par shog/ skye med byang chub sems su byin brlabs pas// mi nub rgyal mtshan lta bur grub par shig/ tshe bu ma ga zhal yas khang du byin brlabs
61a5(ngi): pas/ bde chen gzhal yas khang du grub par shog/ phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis byin brlabs pas// ye shes lha tshogs phyag rgyar gsal bar shog/ tshe 'bras rdo rje'i snying
61a6(ngi): po byin brlabs pas// 'gyur ba med par lhun gyis grub par shog/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyis byin brlabs pas// ye shes lha rnams mthu dang ldan par shog
61a7(ngi): khams gsum 'gro ba'i 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa'i// 'bras bu sku gsung thugs su 'grub par shog/ 'byung ba ye shes lnga ru byin brlabs pas// 'du 'bral med pa
61b1(ngi): lhun gyis grub par shog/ bkra shis tshe bum gang zhing rgyas pa bzhin// bdag cag rgyu sbyor yon bdag gi/ tshe dang bsod nams dbang thang dang // longs spyod rgyas shing
61b2(ngi): gong gyur cig/ tshe bum dbang bskur byin rlabs pas// bdag cag rgyu sbyor lus ngag yod// bde gshegs sku gsung thugs su grub par shog/ 'bras bu gnyen dang bran
61b3(ngi): 'khor rnams// pho mo tshe ring nad me shog/ bum pa 'di yi longs spyod rnams// spyad nas zad cing stongs pa bzhin// rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po yi// tshe dang bsod nams
61b4(ngi): dbang thang la// gnod sbyin bar du gcod pa yi// gegs dang log 'dren zad stongs shog/ oM A yu dz+nyA na bin du b+hA ru ru phu ru/ dzA la sid+d+hi tiSh+Tha lo tsa ni/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/
61b5(ngi): tshe zlu ga yu b+h+yAM ga yu tshe b+hu/ badz+ra a yu she hU a/ zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las tshe'i cho ga nyin gcig pa'i bya thabs kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//
61b6(ngi): / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ kha skongs tshe'i cho ga 'di gsungs so// snod bzangs nang du tshe 'bras bzang po dang // tshe chang bstims
61b7(ngi): tsho'i ba cho grug/ ma po na pa'i / de tu Sh+kar ga ga/ khril
62a1(ngi): 'dab bzhi sgo dang bcas// rin che khri dang rma bya nyi zla ba de// sngags las bskyed pa'i snang mtha' mdog dmar ba// g.yas pa pad+ma'i sdong po thugs
62a2(ngi): khar 'dzin// g.yon pa pad+ma'i sdong po dku la rten// thugs kyi dpal be'u sngags dang bcas// ma chags mkha' dbyings dag pas yum dang 'khril// thugs khar rgya gram
62a3(ngi): nyi zla'i ga'u'i nang // Ni dang a yu gsang ba'i sngags dang ldan// oM shu n+ya ta dz+nyA na a/ oM d+harma ni a/ oM tsit+ta ni hr-iHb+huM rang+tha b+h+yA/ oM badz+ra d+harma hri/ a yu nud pan na ma mo ha ra
62a4(ngi): tidza/ badz+ra d+harma hri/ ni a yu dz+nyA na bi du b+hU/ hUM/ bcom ldan mgon po byams ldan tshe dpag med// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sku mnga' ba// mnyam nyid sku mchog de la phyag
62a5(ngi): 'tshal lo// gsung rab dam pa spros dang bral// yi ge med cing sgra spangs pa// mnyam nyid gsung mchog de la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag rdo rje thugs 'chang ba// tshe dpag
62a6(ngi): med kyi dngos grub stso la mdzad pa// mnyam nyid thugs mchog de la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bdag gzhan tshe nyams kyis// yi ge sprul pa btang byas nas// ri rab rtsen
62a7(ngi): gnas pa yi// lha yi bu yi tshe tshad ni// brgyad khri bzhi stong thub pa'i tshe// rgya mtsho ga ting na gnas pa'i tshe// de dmyal ba'i klang rgyas sbas pa'i tshe// gling bzhi mi yi che
62b1(ngi): rnams kun// a Ni su tri pre dus tshe phrogs nas// mu ga ta ha s+thi rnal byas nas// dz+nyA na tsakra sa kha phye nas// a kar sha ya bzlas brjod pas// lcags kyu ma yis
62b2(ngi): drangs nas ni// a bi sha pa ha ra na hUM/ zhes brjod cing gtso bo byang chub sems// badz+ra s+pho Ta bam gyis bcings// oM b+ha ga wa ti ru ru su ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha si d+hi l-i ts+tsha ni/
62b3(ngi): sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med// sgrib pa'i dri ma phyir bsal te// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sku mnga' ba// mnyam nyid sku la phyag 'tshal lo//
62b4(ngi): mkha' dang mnyam pa'i tshe gsol cig/ bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med// sgrib pa'i dri ma phyir bsal te// rdo rje gsung ba gsung ba che// rdzogs pa'i gsung la phyag
62b5(ngi): 'tshal lo// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i tshe gsol cig/ bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med// sgrib pa'i dri ma phyir bsal te// rdo rje thugs te thugs 'chang ba// rdzogs
62b6(ngi): pa'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i tshe gsol cig/ oM A yu dz+nyA na tshe bru/ rdo rje chos ni gtsor bzung ba'i// hriHlas 'od 'phros 'og mi ni gnas//
62b7(ngi): yum ni a ra ma ma ki/ mgon po dmar ser zhal gcim sa// phyag bzhi thayas kyi dang por// ak+Sho man d+ha'i d+hA las te// g.yon pa'i phyag ni skye bas sbyin can// mtha
63a1(ngi): gnyis bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams// mthe bong phrag nas bdud rtsi 'dzag/ yum ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// g.yas kyi lcags kyus tshe
63a2(ngi): drangs te// g.yon gyi bum pa'i nang du bsag/ shar phyogs zla 'od zhing khams nas// dkar mo spyan phrag rigs kyi yu ma// phyag na tshe dar dkar po bsnams// 'gro
63a3(ngi): ba yongs kyi tshe la mnga' mdzad ma// lho phyogs nyi 'od zhing khams nas// ser mo spyan 'phran rigs kyi yum// phyag na tshe dar ser po bsnams// 'gro ba'i tshe la mnga'
63a4(ngi): mdzad ma// tshe 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ rdo rje tshe mchog 'gug pa'i las mdzod cig/ nub phyogs pad+ma'i zhing khams nas// dmar mo spyan phyag rigs kyi yum/
63a5(ngi): phyag na tshe dar dmar po bsnams// 'gro ba yongs kyi tshe la mnga' mdzad ma// rdo rje tshe mchog 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ byang phyogs rin chen ga zhal ya sa nas//
63a6(ngi): ljang khu spyan phrag rigs kyi yum// phyag na tshe dar ljang khu bsnams// 'gro ba yongs kyi tshe'i las mdzad ma// rdo rje tshe mchog 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ pho nya sa
63a7(ngi): tshe rnams drangs nas ni// yab yum thugs la bstim par byas// sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ ra ho haM/ ra ga ya mi/ mkha' nas 'od zer 'phros pa yis// ri rab rtse
63b1(ngi): nas gling bzhi'i gnas// rgya mtsho gting nas gnas pa sogs// slar 'dus yum gyi b+ha gar thim// gyen du drangs pas bdag lus rgyas// oM pu N+ye pu N+ye/ ma hA
63b2(ngi): puN+yaM.a yu bu N+yai/ a ba ra mi ta/ A yur dz+nyA na sa ro ba tsit+ta swa hA/ oM b+h+yAM/ hUM b+hU/ tra b+hU/ hriHb+h+yA/ ha b+hU/ badz+ra A yu she hU AH// hUr-i rab rtse nas mthu
63b3(ngi): brtan zhing // lha klu gnod sbyin rdul phab ste// 'byung ba rnams la mnga' mdzad ma// sgeg mo de ni yum 'phrog ma// thang cig yud tsam dgongs pa ni// pad+ma'i gdan
63b4(ngi): gzhal ya sra khang // gtso bo rnams la mchod pa'i phyir// dga' ba'i mdangs kyis gshegs su gsol// nyi 'od dkar mo'i gzhal yas nas// mthing ka spyan
63b5(ngi): phrag rigs kyi yum// rdo rje chen mo yid 'phrog ma// gtso bo rnams la mchod pa'i phyir// rdo rje'i 'khor dang gshegs su gsol// bai DUr sngon mo'i zhing khams nas/
63b6(ngi): mthing nag spyan phrag rigs kyi yum// rin chen gtso mo yid 'phrog ma// gtso mo rnams la mchod pa'i phyir// rin chen 'khor dang gshegs su gsol// pad+ma dmar mo'i
63b7(ngi): dkyil 'khor nas// dmar mo spyan phrag rigs kyi yum// thang cig yung tsam yang gas mas kyang // pad+ma thi gangan la gzhal 'angs yang // mun dza ring gi ral ka can
64a1(ngi): gtso bo rnams la mchod pa'i phyir// 'dul skal bzhin du gshegs su gsol// zla 'od ljang khu'i dkyil 'khor nas// ljang khung spyan phrag
64a2(ngi): rigs kyi yum// thang cig yud tsam bsngags nas kyang // pad+ma'i ga dan la ga zhal yas khang // mun tsa ling gi rel ka can// gtso bo rnams la mchod pa'i phyir// tshe yi
64a3(ngi): lha mo ga shegs su gsol// o b+h+yA a yu dz+nyA na/ a yu b+hi na d+ha b+hU/ dz+nyA na a wa lok+ke ti/ sa man+ta s+pha ra Na/ rasmai b+ha wa ti/ a yu dz+nyA na/ du ru du ru hri da ya/ hA b+hU/
64a4(ngi): oM b+h+yAHhUM b+hU/ tri bru~M/ hri b+hU/ ha bruM/ Ni bruM/ rdo rje tshe mchog 'gugs pa'i pho nya ni// ye shes skar ltar 'khrug pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// thugs rje lcags kyu'i
64a5(ngi): 'od zer 'phros pa yis// shar phyogs dri za'i 'jig rten mgo na mdzod cig/ sku lus dmar po rgya ni bzhugs pa la// lag na lcags kyu mang po thogs pa ni// brgya byin 'khor
64a6(ngi): ba cas lag nas tshe khug cig/ in+ta ya tshe bru b+hA/ drang srong me lha'i lag nas tshe 'gug sa ma// rdo rje shang lang lag na 'phyar ba'i mchog/ kha dog dmar ser ma sa ni tshe khug
64a7(ngi): cig/ hri ak+She ye tshe b+h+rUM bru/ grul bum 'jig rten gshin rje'i sdig srul nas// dpa' mgyogs shugs kyis rgyu ga nga'i pho nya ni// sngon mo mdog ldan rin chen zhags
64b1(ngi): pa ma// gdug pa ga shin rje'i lag nas tshe drongs shig/ ya ma ye tshe b+hU b+hU/ srin po bden bral lag nas tshe 'gugs ma// sku mdog ser skya nyi ma bu don rigs// rdo rje cod
64b2(ngi): paN mang po gshibs nas ni// srin po khang bu rdul du 'joms pa'i tshe// dbyar gyi sprin phung 'khrigs pa'i khro gnyer 'dra// zhe sdang srin po'i lag nas tshe khru ga cig/
64b3(ngi): nai re ti yi tshe bruM b+h+ra/ nub phyogs klu yi 'jig rten rab 'byams nas// 'gro ba'i tshesrog sdad ma klu yi r-i gis// kha dog me ltar 'bar ba'i mdog can ni// thugs
64b4(ngi): rjes klog byed 'khor lo bsnams pa ni// klu yi gnas nas tshe drongs pho nya tsho mchog ma// na gra ba ru na ye tshe b+hU b+hu/ rlung lha phyogs skyong lag nas che 'gugs ma// khro
64b5(ngi): mo sku mdog sngo sgyu thal ba'i mdog/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan lag na phyar ba'i mchog/ rlung lha'i khyim ni rdul du brla go nas kyang // rlung lha 'khor bcas lag nas tshe drongs
64b6(ngi): shig/ bA ya bi ye tshe bru bru/ byang phyogs gnod sbyin lag nas tshe 'gugs ma// kha dog ljang khu 'bar ba'i sku mdog la// ral gri ut+pa la so 'dras drangs nas kyang /
64b7(ngi): gnod sbyin 'khor bcas lag nas tshe drongs shiH// ku zer le tshe bru b+h+yAM/ bzegs kyi rgyal po'i lag nas tshe bzhugs ma// mthog ldan sna tshogs kha dog ljang khu'i rigs//
65a1(ngi): dbu sangs spyan can rdzu 'phral ga dug pa'i phyag/ rin chen mtshon cha sna tsho ga sa dril nas ni// bgegs kyi khyim rnams thal bar brla ga nas
65a2(ngi): kyang / bi na ya ka'i lag nas tshe khug cig/ bi na ya ka na na che bru b+hU/ nyi zla gza' skar lag nas tshe 'gugs ma// kha dog dmar ljang nyi zla'i 'khor lo 'phen//
65a3(ngi): nyi ma'i khyim dang zla ba'i gnas rnams dang // nyi zla gza' skar log nas tshe khu ga cig/ sur+ya tsan+ta ye tshe bru bru/ sa 'og sa 'dzin lag nas tshe 'gugs ma// ye
65a4(ngi): shes ting 'dzin lhag pa'i spu gri yis// phyag mtshan spu gri bsnams pas tshe khug cig/ na ga pra be yaM tshe b+hU bru/ muk+ta ho yis bshig pa'i rdol gyur nas// rdo rje nyi
65a5(ngi): zla rgya gram gyis// Ni la bstim nas sba bar bya// a pad+ma ta kr-id ha ya gri wa e ka dza ti/ hu lu hu lu hu b+h+yAM hUM/ ha kr-id dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// pad+ma/
65a6(ngi): rgya gra ma bsnams nas yum dang 'khril// e ka dza ti khaT+Ta thod pa bsnams// thugs khar tshe dbang bsdus nas bsrungs pa yis// stong pa'i dbyings su tshe sbas
65a7(ngi): nas/ chos kyi dbyings nas ye shes gsal// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ tshe gzhan gyi kha bskong gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// /
65b1(ngi): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis che'i cho ga kun la 'gro ba 'di gsungs so// tshe bsgrub kha bskyongs nyin gcig pa'i// gang yang rung ba'i
65b2(ngi): bya ba ni// bum pa chang bkang tshe zan bca'o// mda' dar dmar po me long thogs// rigs lnga so so'i snying po'am// spyi bsdus bgrangs la tshe bum bstim// de nas tshe/
65b3(ngi): ni dgug par bya// oM pu N+ye pu N+ye/ ma hA puN+ye ye/ a pa ra mi ta/ A yu dz+nyA na/ sal+yA ro ba tsit+ta swA hA/ hUbacom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med// sgrib pa'i
65b4(ngi): dri ma ma lus sel// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sku mnga' ba// mnyam nyid sku la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med// gsung mchog rnam par dag pa'i
65b5(ngi): gsung / mkha' dang mnyam pa'i gsung mnga' ba// mnyam nyid gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med// thugs mchog rnam par mi rtog thugs//
65b6(ngi): mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba// mnyam nyid thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// oM bud+d+ha lots+tsha ni a yu She o// badz+ra lots+tsha ni a yu She hUM/ rat+na lo tsa na a yu She swa
65b7(ngi): pad+ma lots+tsha a mi a yu She h+yeHkarma lo ts+tsha ma a yu She A/ hUM ma ma mkha' dbyings phyug mi ni y-i nas rnam par dag/ rdo rje dbyings phyug ma ni sems skye shi med// rin chen
66a1(ngi): dbyings phyug ma ni dgos 'dod re bskong // pad+ma dbyings phyug ma ni 'dzin med chags dang bral// las kyi dbyings phyug ma ni mngon spyod 'phrin las
66a2(ngi): mdzad/ dbyings phyug chen mo lnga rnams kyis// rdo rje tshe yi dngos grub gsol// oM badz+ra a yu She a/ hUM/ shar gyi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma// gsang ba'i lha mo rgyas
66a3(ngi): 'debs ma// rigs kyi lha mo sangs rgyas spyan// phyag rgya'i lha mo lA s+ya ma// mchod pa'i lha mo d+hU be ma// 'gugs pa'i lha mo lcags kyu ma// tshe bdag chen mo khyed rnams
66a4(ngi): kyis/ shar phyogs dri za'i lag nas tshe drongs la// shar lho me lha'i lag nas dpal skyobs shig/ badz+ra ang+gu sha dza/ lho yi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma// gsang ba'i lha mo
66a5(ngi): za byed ma// rigs kyi lha mo mA ma ki/ phyag rgya'i lha mo mA le ma// mchod pa'i lha mo puSh+pe ma// 'tsheng ba'i lha mo zhags pa ma// tshe bdag chen mo khyed rnams kyis// lho phyogs
66a6(ngi): gshin rje'i lag nas tshe drangs la// lho nub srin po'i lag nas dpal skyobs shig/ rat+na pA sha hUM/ nub kyi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma// gsang ba'i lha mo tshe 'phel ma//
66a7(ngi): rigs kyi lha mo gos dkar mo// phyag rgya'i lha mo gi rti ma// mchod pa'i lha mo A lo ke/ sdom pa'i lha mo lcags sgrog ma// tshe bdag chen mo khyed rnams kyis// nub phyogs
66b1(ngi): klu dbang lag nas tshe rmongs la// nub byung rlung sgra'i laganas dpal skyobs shig/ pad+ma thA haH/ byang gi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma// gsang ba'i l+h+wa mchongs byed ma/
66b2(ngi): rigs kyi lha mo dam tshig sgrol// phyag rgya'i lha mo nir ti ma// mchod pa'i lha mo gan d+he ma// 'bebs pa'i lha mo dril bum// tshe bdag chen mo khyed rnams kyis// byang phyogs
66b3(ngi): gnod sbyin lag nas tshe drangs la// byang shar dbang ldan lag nas dpal skyobs shig/ karma gan d+he ho// de nas tshe gzhan du yar ba dang / 'thor ba dang /
66b4(ngi): bsdigs pa rnams bkug nas bum par bstim pa ni hUM a yu dz+nyA na tshe yi mchog/ sal nyams na gser la bsdu// tshul nyams na chang la bsdu// shing la nyams na maral
66b5(ngi): sdu/ rtsi la nyams na sbrang la bsdu// 'bru la nyams na til la bsdu// 'bru sna snying po sna lnga yis// sna lnga dag tu byin gyis rlobs// rnal 'byor tshel bar chad med//
66b6(ngi): rdo rje tshe yi dbang bskur te// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// nam mkha' gsang ba gsum las byung // nam mkha' rigs kyi dbang bskur bas// dbang bskur chen po dam
66b7(ngi): pa sbyin/ oM bud+d+ha ka la sha o/ ba tA lo tsa a b+hi'iny+tsa o/ ji skad sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rdo rje gsang ba gsum las byung // rdoHrigs kyi dbang bskur bas/
67a1(ngi): dbang bskur chen po dam pa sbyin// hUM badz+ra ka la sha hUM/ badz+ra lo tsa a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rin chen gsang ba gsum
67a2(ngi): las byung // rin chen rigs kyi dbang bskur bas// dbang bskur chen po dam pa sbyin// swa rat+na ka la sha swa/ rat+na lo tsa a b+hi Shiny+tse taM/ ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//
67a3(ngi): pad+ma gsang ba gsum las byung // pad+ma rigs kyi dbang bskur ba sa// dbang mchog chen po dam pa sbyin// a pad+ma ka la sha hriH/ pad+ma lo tsa a b+hi Shiny+tsA hriH/ ji snyed sangs rgyas
67a4(ngi): thams cad kyis// las rab gsang ba gsum las byung // las kyi rigs kyi dbang bskur bas// dbang mchog chen po dam pa sbyin// ha karma ka la sha karma lo tsa a b+hi Shany+tsa a/
67a5(ngi): zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ tshe bsgrub chen po byed rung / kha skongs byed rung / tshe cho ga nyin gcig pa byed rung / gang dgos su
67a6(ngi): bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis longs spyod tshogs kyi bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// longs spyod bsgrub pa'i gzhi chen ni//
67a7(ngi): gsang bdag pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// longs spyod rgyu brtag phun sum tshogs// dkyil 'khor bca' tshe bca' bkod pa dang // gzhal yas khang dang tshe bskyed dang // spyan drang
67b1(ngi): dang ni bstim pa dang // tshe yi rang bzhin 'gugs pa'i thabs// tshe bcing bzlas brjod tshe blan dang // dbang bskur sdom dang smra bar bya// dam bca' dor nas bgegs dbang
67b2(ngi): skur// dgra dbang gyur dang mkha' 'gros gtses// rbod gtong khar bab dus mi 'gro// tshe nyams pa yi rgyu ru bshad// gzi brjid med dang lus nyams bral// mdog
67b3(ngi): kyang bya ba dor ba dang // yid mi bde dang brjid stobs med// tshe nyams pa yi rtags su bshad// ston pa rgyu dang man ngag mkhas// gnas ni bkra shis nyams kyang dga'//
67b4(ngi): yum dang karma ging gi 'khor// yo byad rdzas rnams 'tshogs pa dang // bkra shis dus la 'jug par bya// phyi mtshams dang ni phyi bshags dang // nang mtshams dang ni kha
67b5(ngi): bskongs bya// dam sri mnan dang sgo byang gdags// ma tra mnan cing rdo rje 'gros// mtshon cha khra bo khrag 'thung rol// bdag gi tshe yi sngon 'gror bshad// dkyil 'khor
67b6(ngi): thig bzhi li tshe dgu// pad+ma 'dab brgyad gru chad bzhi// sgro dang bcas pa bri bar bya// dbus su shel gyi bum par ni// dmar ser ba yi 'o ma dang // tsong zhi dkar po rnam
67b7(ngi): gdu na dang // dkar dang mngar gsum 'chi med sman// byang chub sems su gzhag par bya// mu ge sel ba'i 'bru lnga dang // 'du ba sel ba'i sman lnga dang // nor phye dbyin/
68a1(ngi): ldan rin chen lnga// snying po lnga dang dri lnga bshams// tshe 'bras rgya gram rgyas btab nas// mda' dang bcas pa bzhag pa ni// lha yi grangs dang
68a2(ngi): mnyam par bya// mchod pa mang pos yongs su bskor// rtags gdab las ni bskos la gdab// rtags dang byin dbab rkang pa la// ting 'dzin gsum las byung ba yi// 'byung
68a3(ngi): ba rim brtsegs gzhal yas gdan// dbus su tshe dpag med pa yab yum gnyis// phyogs bzhir rigs kyi yum bzhi la// mtshams su gsang ba'i yum bzhi nyid// pad+ma
68a4(ngi): brgyad la lha mo brgyad// sgo bzhir sgo ma bkod nas ni// spyan drangs pa yi rim pa bya// tshe yi rang bzhin yum gyi mkha'// rdo rje rgya gram nyi zla'i stengs// rgya khram lte ba
68a5(ngi): bcas pa// a yu dz+nyA na bin du b+hU// shin tu gsal bar shes par bya'o// hUM/ pad+ma stong ldan dbus kyi pho brang na// bcom ldan gsung mchog mgon po tshe dpag med//
68a6(ngi): thugs kha'i dpal be'u zla gsang ga'u nas// rnal 'byor byang chub sems kyi a yu dmar po 'di// rtse gcig bdag gis bsgrub pa'i tshe lags kyi// bdag la byin gyis
68a7(ngi): rlobs shing gshegs su gsol// shar phyogs mngon par dga' ba'i zhing khams nas// rdo rje rigs kyi yum chen dbyings phyug ma// lho phyogs dpal dang ldan pa'i zhing
68b1(ngi): khams nas// rin chen rigs kyi yum chen ma ma ki/ nub phyogs bde ba can gyi zhing khams nas// pad+ma rigs kyi yum chen na bza' dkar// byang phyogs rnam dag
68b2(ngi): bkod pa'i zhing khams nas// las kyi rigs kyi yum chen dam tshig sgrol// dbus phyogs byang chub snying po'i zhing khams nas// de bzhin rigs kyi yum chan sangs
68b3(ngi): rgyas spyan// bde ba rgyas 'debs reg pa dra ba'i sa// bde ba chu 'phel de ni gsher ba'i chu// bde ba za byed de ni dro ba'i me// bde ba rmongs byed de ni g.yo ba'i rlung // thig
68b4(ngi): le nam mkha'i bde stong 'bebs mdzad ma// rdo rje tshe yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// rdo rje sgeg mo dga' ba'i ye shes rol// rin chen 'phreng ba ma ni mchog dga' nyid//
68b5(ngi): pad+ma klu len dga' bral ya shes skyong // las kyi karma lhan skyes ye shes spyod// rdo rje bdug pa ma ni thig le g.yo// rin chen me tog ma ni thig le 'bar// pad+ma mar me
68b6(ngi): ma ni thog le 'bebs// las kyi dri chab ma ni thig le brtan// byams pa'i lcags kyu mas ni zhi bas 'gugs// snying rje zhags pa mas ni rgyas pa sa 'ching // dga'
68b7(ngi): ba'i myug la sgrog ma la ni dbang du sdud// btang snyoms dril bu mas ni drag pos 'bebs// lha mo nyi shu thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// rnal 'byor byang chub sems kyi a ru
69a1(ngi): dmar po 'di// rtse gcig bdag gis bsgrub pa'i tshe lags kyis/ badrug lnga byin gyis rlobs cing gshegs su gsol// a yu dz+nyA na sa ma la
69a2(ngi): dzaH/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ bcom ldan mgon po snang mtha' tshe dpag med// sku mdog dmar po gzi brjid 'bar// phyag mtshan pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsnams// phyag
69a3(ngi): mtshan pad+ma 'dob brgyad kyis// phyogs bcu nam mkha' gang ba'i bgegs bcom na// bcom ldan deng 'dir tshe yi dngos grub stsol// 'gro ba yongs kyi tshe la mnga'
69a4(ngi): mdzad kyang // 'gro ba yongs kyi tshe ni mi 'gugs kyi// bdag cag rnal 'byor mched lcam 'khor bcas kyi// tshe la nyams pa mchis na gso ru gsol// tshe la yo
69a5(ngi): ba mchis na bsrang du gsol// tshe la yar ba mchis na dgug tu gsol// tshe la chad pa mchis na rdo rje'i mdud pa mdzad du gsol// shar phyogs dri za'i leg nas tshe khug
69a6(ngi): la/ shar lho me lha'i lag nas drod phyung zhig/ lho phyogs gshin rje'i lag nas srog skyobs la// lho nub srin po'i lag nas sha rnams khug/ nub phyogs klu yi lag nas
69a7(ngi): dpal phrog sa la// nub byang rlung lha'i lag nas dbugs khrol zhig/ byang phyogs gnod sbyin lag nas longs spyod khug/ byang shar dbang ldan la gnas zung khrag drongs//
69b1(ngi): steng phyogs nyi zla'i lag nas ma dang sa phrogs la// 'og phyogs sa bdag lag nas gzi brjid khug/ lha dbang brgya byin la ga nas srog khug la// mi yi de mu srin lag nas
69b2(ngi): tshe dra ngas shig/ btsan 'dre'i btsun 'dre'i lag nas longs spyod khug/ the rang 'gong po'i lag nas srog skyobs shig/ yul bdag sa srin la gnas dpal khug la//
69b3(ngi): tshe khug srog skyobs bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzod// o a yu dz+nyA na tshe bru/ sra byed sa la dbang byed sangs rgyas spyan// gnyen mdud chul dbang byed ma ma ki/ sreg byed
69b4(ngi): me yi kun spyod gos dkar mo// g.yo byed rlung gis 'gugs byed dam tshig sgrol// kun shong go 'byed nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma// rdo rje sgeg mo bde ba'i nyams
69b5(ngi): la spyod// rin chen 'phreng ba bde ba mi brjed 'dzin// pad+ma dbyangs mkhan bde ba'i nyams la rol// las kyi gar mkhan bde ba'i 'bebs pa mo// bde ba rgyas 'debs ni
69b6(ngi): ba'i nyams dang ldan// bde ba tshe 'bebs rgyas las brjed par ldan// bde ba za byed rang gi lus la 'bar// bde ba rmongs byed rnam par rtog pa 'joms// byang chub sems
69b7(ngi): kyi rung ba'i ljin du 'khrims// rin chen mdzes pa'i me tog maHla 'dzul// yang be zong gas mal ba sum la du 'bral med// thig le bdud rtsir yum gyi d+ha gar 'bebs/
70a1(ngi): lcags kyu drangs pas nyams ni sems la 'char// zhags pas bcings pas bde ba lus la 'bar// lcags sgrog bsdams pas mthong snang lus la
70a2(ngi): skyes/ dril bus sgeg pas gsung ni sngags su 'char// las bzhi'i 'phrin las bag chags sems la smin// tshe la dbang mdzad lha mo nyi shu yis// tshe khug tshe drongs
70a3(ngi): gsang ba'i 'phrin las mdzod// oM badz+ra mug ta ho/ hA/ shar gyi phyogs nas tshe 'dren srog 'gugs ma// byams pa'i rang bzhin lha mo lcags kyu ma// phyag g.yas zla ba'i
70a4(ngi): dkyil 'khor bsnams// sku mdog dkar po 'od dang ldan// phyag g.yon nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams// pu sha ra ga'i 'od zer 'phro// phyag g.yas zla ba'i dkyil stengs
70a5(ngi): na// thabs kyi tshe 'dzin bum pa bsnams// phyag g.yon nyi ma'i dkyil stengs na// shes rab 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu 'dren// 'gro kun tshel mnga' brnyes ma// tshe khug
70a6(ngi): srog skyobs gsang ba'i 'phrin las mdzod// badz+ra ang+ku sha dza/ lho yi phyogs nas tshe 'dren srog 'gugs ma// snying rje'i rang bzhin lha mo zhags pa ma// sku mdog sngon mo 'bar
70a7(ngi): bal/ in+d+ra nI la'i 'od zer 'phro// phyag g.yas zla ba'i gzhal yas nas// shes rab tshe yi bum pa bsnams// phyag g.yon nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nas// thabs kyis tshe
70b1(ngi): 'ching zhags pa bsnams// 'gro kun tshe srog sdud mdzad ma// rnal 'byor tshe yi las mdzod cig/ pA sha hU/ nub kyi phyogs nas srog skyobs tshe 'gugs ma// dga'
70b2(ngi): bas dbang mdzad lha mo lcags sgrogs ma// sku mdog dmar mo 'bar ba la// pad+ma 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'phro// phyag g.yas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// shes rab stong
70b3(ngi): ba'i tshe 'dzin ma// phyag g.yon nyi ma'i dkyil stangs na// thabs kyi lcags sgrog snying rje can// khams gsum tshe srog mnga' mdzad ma// rdo rje tshel longs spyod kun//
70b4(ngi): khug cig drongs shig brtan par mdzad// s+pho Ta ba/ byang gi phyogs nas srog skyobs tshe 'gugs ma// btang snyoms rang bzhin lha mo dril bum// sku mdog ljang khu 'brar ba
70b5(ngi): la/ ma ra ga ta'i 'od 'phrom// phyag g.yas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor na// kun gyi tshe 'dzin bum pa bsnams// phyag g.yon nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor na// kun gyi tshe bgyis
70b6(ngi): dril bu 'khrol// 'gro kun tshe la mnga' mdzad kyang // 'gro kun tshe ni mi 'gugs kyi// rnal 'byor bdag cag 'khor bcas kyi// tshe khug srog skyobs 'phrin las mdzod/
70b7(ngi): g+han d+he ho/ 'phro 'du 'od kyis bkug byas la/ ma lus bum pa'i bcud la bsdu// de mas rdo rje tshe bcings pa// badz+ra po ta ba zhes pas// nyi zla ba'u rdo rje 'dzin/ 7
71a1(ngi): sgrog dag gis bcing bar bya// rang nyid lhar gsal sna bug nas// rlung gi 'od kyis 'phro 'du bya// oM badz+ra a yu She/ hU a de nas 'gro drug
71a2(ngi): thams cad kyi// tshe dang gzi brjid kun phrogs nas// za ma tog tu bsdus nas ni// tshe yi rigs 'dzin rnams la bstim// dpa' bo 'bru lnga gsal ba yi// tshe yi dbang ni
71a3(ngi): bskur bar 'gyur// o/ phung po lnga'i dkyil 'khor du// rgyal ba rigs lce'i rang bzhin las// 'byung lnga yum gyi gzugs su bcas// khyed la bskur bas tshe yi dbang // rdo rje
71a4(ngi): tshe dbang thob gyur cig/ ka lak+Sha bak+Sha a bi shin// oM hU tA hI/ a Ni/ de nas slob ma'i snying kha'i nr-il tshe bstim ste// rang lus gzi brjid 'bar te 'od dang ldan// khams
71a5(ngi): kyi bdud rtsi rgyas par 'gyur// tshe yi rang bzhin yi ge NI// skye med a ru rab tu gnas// cis kyang mi tshugs mi shigs pa'i// stong pa'i go cha bla na med// chos kyi dbyings su
71a6(ngi): sbas nas ni// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs so// de nas gtor ma gtang bar bya// las kyi lhag chad kha bskang nas// spyod lam legs par gnas par bya'o// bdud rtsi 'khyil
71a7(ngi): ba 'chi med tsha'i rgyud las/ tshe bsgrub pa chen po'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba dag pa'i dkyil 'khor du tshe bsgrub
71b1(ngi): ba 'di gsungs so// bde ba'i gnas su dkyil 'khor ni// 'khor lo rtsabis brgyad gru chad sgo// dbus na mgon po tshod dbag med// shar na mi bskyod lho rini 'byung // nub na snang
71b2(ngi): mtha' byang don grub// sa yi snying po rdo rje sems// nam mkha'i snying po rin chen sems// spyan ras gzigs ni pad+ma sems// las kyi sems dpa' phyag rdor yin// sgo bzhir
71b3(ngi): gshin rje stobs chen dang // rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil ba gnas// tshe bum chang dang tshe 'bras bca'// mda' dang dar bcas mchod rdzas rnams// dkyil 'khor du ni mdzes
71b4(ngi): bar ba shams// bde gshegs bskyed cing spyan drangs bstim// mchod nas tshe yi dngos grub grub// o ru ru su ru dza la ti tha sid+d+hi lo ts+tsha ni sarba ar+tha sa d+ha na a yu dz+nyA na b+hin du d+hu/
71b5(ngi): a ba ra mi ta tshe b+hU/ sU/ dbus kyi mgon po tsho dpag med// yab yum thugs kyi ga'u nas// a yu dmar po rang byung nas// don grub thugs rgyud rang bzhin bkug/ rdzas la
71b6(ngi): bstim zhing bsgrub par bya// nub phyogs pad+ma dbang gi dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan byams mgon tshe dpag med// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor zlags ga'u nas// byang chub
71b7(ngi): sems kyi a myong ma po cad // rtsa gcig bdag gis bsgrubs pa'i tshe lags na// byin gyis rlob cing bdag la dngos grub rtsol// rigs kyi rgyal ba rab sum rnams// tshul
72a1(ngi): mchog 'di yis shes par bya// tshe yi pho nya btang nas kyang // srid gsum gnas nas tshe srog ni// yi ge Ne ru bsdus byas nas// byang sems
72a2(ngi): bde ba chen po yi// kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid// a yu dmar po shes par bya// skye ba med pa'i sems nyid 'di// 'chi med rdo rje zhes bya ste// mi 'gyur g.yung drung
72a3(ngi): ye bdal che// mi nub ye shes rgyal mtshan yin// de lta bu yi dngos grub ni// rnal 'byor bdag gis blang bar bya// mched dang lcam dral slob ma rnams// tshe yi bum pas
72a4(ngi): dbang bskur nas// tshe yi rang bzhin gnas shes pa// dpa' bo 'bru lnga dbang bstim bya// mkha' 'gro chos skyong gtor ma btang // gter spa dge ba sngo dkyil 'khor bsdu/
72a5(ngi): zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ gsang bdag pa'i dkyil 'khor du tshe ba sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// /
72a6(ngi): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba dag pa'i rdzas la tshe bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// bkra shis dag pa'i rdzas stsal te// mdo sde zangs gzhong 'khar sder du// kri yaH
72a7(ngi): phyis dung chos la// ma hA skye ba bdun pa'i ro// bya rgod rkang gi bsdu lta sa te// zhun chen mar me gzugs bdun pa// skra kham shel mig dpral dbyibs che// rme bdun pa
72b1(ngi): spu zangs thal 'byung // dung so 'khor bar yod pa yi// tshe skyems tshe 'bras gzungs thag bzung // snod ni gzhal yas khang gyur nas// tshe skyems sa ti lo ts+tsha ni// ljang
72b2(ngi): ser zhal gcig phyog bani ma// tshe dar gri gug g.yas pa na// bdud rtsi bum pa rgya gram g.yon// de yi mkha' dbyings tshe dpag med// dmar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma//
72b3(ngi): rin chen 'phreng ba za ma tog/ shel 'phreng ne'u le'i rgyal ba g.yon// de 'khor rigs kyi yum chen lnga// rigs mdog yum chen lnga ni phyag mtshan rigs// mig la rgyus
72b4(ngi): 'debs lcags kyu dkar// rna ba rmongs byed zhags bsngo// snal tshe 'phel lcags sgrog dmar// lce la za byed dril bu ljang // tshe bsrungs pad+ma kun da li// dmar po pad+ma
72b5(ngi): rgyu zam bsnam so// a mu rmo thu dz+nyAn tshe d+hu b+hin dud+d+ha/ ma par mi ta tshen+tu/ chags pa'i rdo rje bdag nyid tshe// pad+ma rgyal po kun lo// sprul pa'i khro ba grangs med pas/
72b6(ngi): tshe la gnod pa'i bgeg rnams kun// de yi gzugs bcom pha rol du// gang zhig tshe la gnod byed bskrad// b+han d+ha Ta tra phaT/ tshe la dbang bskur bstim pa dang //
72b7(ngi): sbas nas rgyas gdapa smon lam gdab// thod pa yongs spyod pater du bcas// sha rnams su yis thol pas ni// thun mong dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bdud rtsi gyi
73a1(ngi): kha 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ gsang ba dag pa'i rdzas la tshe bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom
73a2(ngi): ldan 'das kyis/ mkha' dbyings rnam par dag pa'i yum la tshe bsgrub pa'i cho ga 'di gsungs so// dben pa'i gnas su phyin nas ni// pad+ma can nam dung can nam// ba
73a3(ngi): glang 'dra 'am ri dag sa 'dra// mtshan dang ldan pa'i gzungs ma la// dpa' bo 'bru lnga lu sa la bkod// rigs lnga ye shes lngar byin brlabs// yab yum mkha'
73a4(ngi): gsang ba snol bas ni// rdo rje pad+ma mar byin brlabs nas// bde mchog bde bral bde ba dang // lhan skyes khu ba 'phro'adu las// hU~M las rta mgrin khro bo dmar// zhal
73a5(ngi): gsum pa la phyag drug pa// sngags 'chang rgyal po gang gnas pa// phyag rgya'i bdag nyid de na gnas// phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor na// sma sha nag po don snying za//
73a6(ngi): de'i yang gsang ba thugs dkyil nas// gsung gi rgyal po rta mchog dpal// phyag mtshan phyag na 'khrug drug bsnams// 'brug dkar 'brug sngon 'brug ljang dang //
73a7(ngi): 'brug ser 'brug dmar 'brug nag bsnams// 'brug gi kha nas glog 'byin cing // glog gi kha nas thog 'bebs la// gnod sbyin dmar po klad pa 'gems// de'i
73b1(ngi): sems kyis dal bsgoms nas// drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ rdo rje cha yi dngos grub stsol// o a yu dz+nyA na tshe bru/ dga' ba bzhi dang ldan pa yi//
73b2(ngi): bsnyen bsgru ba rnam bzhi ba sgrub pa yi// khu ba 'thungs na nad med cing // de yi tshe yang lha dang mnyam// dbang gi mchog tu de 'gyur ro// bsgrub pa po'i thugs su
73b3(ngi): bstim// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ gsang ba mkha' dbyings la tshe ba sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//
73b4(ngi): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje chos kyis/ mchod pa de kho na nyid kyis mchod nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bde ba chen
73b5(ngi): bo'i thugs// 'gro ba kun la kun gzhi yid// rnal 'byor a yu'i tshe rnams bsgrubs// dam rdzas byang sems dkar dmar len// 'di yis tshe dang srog rten pas//
73b6(ngi): mgon po khyed la rjes yi rangs// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// 'gyur med tshe yi dngos grub rgyud// rdo rje chos kyis bzung la mkha'
73b7(ngi): 'gros bsrungs// chos kyi sgyum ldan spyod pas 'gro don mdzad// mi nub bstan ba rgyas par khyed kyis spyod// rtses gsungs so// ston pa dang 'khor rnams chos nyid kyi ngang du
74a1(ngi): thim ste/ chos skur bzhugs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//
74a2(ngi): bdud rtsi 'khyil ba 'chi med tshe'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// // 'od tshig rgyud yin pas spel na// dam can chos skyong dang / mkha' 'gro rnams
74a3(ngi): kyi bka' chad yong bas/ lung mtho pa la thos par mi bya ste/ mthong ba lta ci smos so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po pa NaDi ta bi ma mi thal/ zod kyi lo ts+tsha ba mchims mdzad
74a4(ngi): gsal 'bar gyis nus te/ bsgyur nas gtan la phab bo// rgya gar skad du/ a mr-i ta ma hA d+harma tA gu h+ya tan+ta
74a5(ngi): nA ma/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi chen po chos nyid gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos
74a6(ngi): ba'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad ngo bo nyid sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las ma lus pa'i bdag po de ni/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po
74a7(ngi): rnams dang / rdo rje yid bzhin nor bu'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par bzhugs nas/ khams gsum pa'i sems can ma lus pa'i lus khams bdud rtsi chen por rang
74b1(ngi): 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje chos rang gi gdan las bzhengs nas/ 'di skad ces gsol ba 'debs so// gtsang ma
74b2(ngi): zas la spyod pa'i// lha dang bram ze klu dang bcas// rang bskal 'bru sogs za ba'i// gling bzhi sems can mi dang bcas// las ngan ngan lkugs spyod pa'i// dud 'gro
74b3(ngi): yi dgas dmyal bar bcas// rang 'byung bdud rtsi ma rtogs pa'i// mtshan nyid sde gsum kri yog gsum// las ngan 'gro ba 'dul ba dang // skal ngan theg pa drang ba'i
74b4(ngi): phyir/ rang 'byung bdud rtsi chen po'i// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor du gsol// zhes zhus nas rang gi don la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
74b5(ngi): kyis seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la spyan gyi lta stangs kyis gzigs nas/ 'di skad ces
74b6(ngi): gsungs so// sems can nyon mongs snang bral// rtsa ba dug gsum las byung ba'i// nyon mongs rnam pa shar ba lnga// brgyad khri bzhi stong rnam grangs snang // rnam
74b7(ngi): 'byor nyams kyi snang ba la// mtshan nyid phyi mas ma rdzogs yang // bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga po las// khams kyi 'du mug sa gsum du snang // bde bar gshegs pa dus
75a1(ngi): gsum gyi// sangs rgyas rnams la sku gsung thugs// mi bzang brgyan gyi 'khor lo snang // snang ba gsum gyi las byung ba'i// rang byung bdud rtsi
75a2(ngi): sgrub pa'i thabs// khyed la bshad kyis legs par nyon// sems can nyon mongs snang ba la// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor chen po ru// rigs 'dzin sman bsgrub bshad par
75a3(ngi): bya/ rnal 'byor nyams kyis snang ba la// phung po dag la bsten byas pa'i// rang 'byung bdud rtsi bsgrub par bshad// bde bar gshegs pa'i snang ba la// rigs
75a4(ngi): brgya rigs lnga rigs gcig dang // bdud rtsi gong bu che mchog gi/ ye shes lha yi dkyil 'khor bshad// lta bas thag gcad gdeng du bya// spyod pa'i la yang rab
75a5(ngi): dor nas// bsgrub pas nyams su blangs nas ni// dam tshig zhing sa gshin po la// bsnyen bsgrub sa bon rab btab nas// rim pa dbang gis bsgrod byas pas//
75a6(ngi): 'bras bu lo tog smin par byas// rab 'bring tha ma'i rnal 'byor pa// las dang skal bar rab ldan pas// bsgrubs na kun gyis 'grub par 'gyur// bdud rtsi yon
75a7(ngi): tan bsgrub pa 'di// ma 'ongs rnal 'byor grol phyir bshad// ces gsungs so// bdud rtsi chen po chos nyid gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi dang gleng bslang
75b1(ngi): ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsgrub pa thams cad kyi gzhi phun sum tshogs pa 'di gsungs so// ston pa blo yangs khru
75b2(ngi): 'khrig chung // phyi nang rgyud la mkhas par sbyangs// bde gshegs thugs kyi snying khu rtogs// mi 'gyur spyod lam mkha' ltar yangs// dgyes pa bskong ba yum gyi
75b3(ngi): rigs// mchod stobs gsang ba'i phyag tshang ba// bla ma'i thugs dang 'thad pa dang // rdul phyags phyi nang 'tshams mkhan dang // nyung yang lnga la sogs pa'i// yab yum
75b4(ngi): thabs dang shes rab ldan// mched ldum rdo rje lu gu rgyud// gdung zhing rang gi mig ltar 'phangs// skye bo yal ka can dag dang // min gnyan thos skal sman spangs//
75b5(ngi): dben cing nyams dga' dpags pa'i gnas// rtsi sman shing dang nags tshal dang // btsal nas bsgrub pa brtsam par bya// sa bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la// rgyan
75b6(ngi): dang bcas pa'i gtor ma btang // blang dang sbyang dang byin gyis brlabs// zla ba ston zla 'bring po dang // dpyid zla 'bring po dag la bya// tshes grangs yar gyi brgyad la brtsa ma//
75b7(ngi): bsod nams tshogs kyang rdzogs par 'gyur// bco lnga'i dus la dngos grub blang // zla rgyas ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs// 'tsho ba zas dang dug 'joms sman// mchod
76a1(ngi): ba'i rdzas dang bsgrub pa'i rdzas// 'phags pa mchod cing gtor ma gtong // mgron bzhi mnyes par bya phyir ro// sbyin sreg tsha tshas sgrib pa sbyong /
76a2(ngi): bsod nams bskyed cing bgegs rnams zho// bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cul// gtor ma gser skyems gtang bar bya// phyogs bzhir mtho bzhi btsugs nas kyang //
76a3(ngi): rgyal po chen po sde bzhi la// phyi mtshams bcad pa'i 'phrin las bcol// spyan drang phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul// 'phrin las bcol la gsol byang gdags// phur pa
76a4(ngi): dar gyi cod pan can// khro bo bcu ru byin brlabs nas// phyogs bzhi mtshams dang steng 'og bcur// rim pa bzhin du gnas par bya// dur khrod gnas rnams rang bsrung
76a5(ngi): bas// dam sri mi g.yo mgon pos gnan// bar chad dngos grub bsrung don du// sgo byung bdud rtsi gshin rje gshed// ma trang lta spyod mnan pa'i phyir// dpal chen khrag
76a6(ngi): 'thung 'bar bas bsgral// lha dang dkyil 'khor slob ma rnams// sta gon la ni gnas pa'i phyir// ma 'dres pa'i mchod che la// zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor mchod byas nas//
76a7(ngi): mnyes nas mkha' 'gro dbang por bzhag/ de nas sman gyi rdzas mchog gis// dam tshig mnan zhing bsgyur bar bya// de nas sngags pas thod pa'i nang // dam chu byin gyis brlabs
76b1(ngi): par bya// rab dra ba gur bcas pas// de lus bar chad bskrad par bya// yol nang rdo rje'i zam pa la// slob ma dag kyang drang bar bya// mtha' yas sems ni rab rmongs
76b2(ngi): bas// theg pa chen por de sems bskyed// rdo rje slob dpon bla ma la// byin gyis brlabs par zhus nas ni// bla ma bu rnams lus ngag yid// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis
76b3(ngi): brlabs// yi dam lha mchog mi spang phyir// lus ngag dang bas phyag 'tshal nas// tshe rabs thog ma med pa nas// bsags pas nyes pa bshags par bya// ma rig mun
76b4(ngi): bas mdongs pa'i// spyan yang dbye bar zhu ba zhus// slob dpon gyis ni gnang nas ni// de nas spyan yang dbye ba byas// mthong ba'i yi dam pra btags pa// lha la me tog
76b5(ngi): rab gtor 'bul// bla mas me tog lhar bcas pa// slob ma dag la bstim par bya// lha la bdud rtsi la sogs pa// mchod pas kyang ni rab tu mchod// rtsa ba yan lag
76b6(ngi): bcas pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa dbog par bya// 'dres pa'i chos dang ma 'dres pa// dam tshig gnyis su med par bsre// bskal par srog la bab 'gyur yang // mi gtong
76b7(ngi): bsrung bar dam yang brdar// rang gi yi ma gang yin lha// bla ma la yang 'bogs par nus// gamang byas sku mngog phyag mtshan bcas// phyag rgya chen por dbog par bya//
77a1(ngi): slob ma las dang skal ldan rnams// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub sbyin// de la 'phreng ba rab ga tad nas// 'dzab kyi snying po 'dren du gzhug
77a2(ngi): sngags kyi rdo rje dril chen li// rim pa yang dag gnas par bya// slob ma dam par gyur pa rnams// bla ma rin chen lta bu la// 'dza' gang gtang rag rab tu gtang // dkyil
77a3(ngi): 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi pa// 'phang du chag gang yod par bya// dang por dag par bya ba'i phyir// bdud rtsi lnga yis chag chag gdab// oM sar+b+ba pan tsa a mr-i ta ma d+ha la hUM//
77a4(ngi): de nas byin dang ldan pa'i phyir// nang gi dam rdzus chag chag gdab// oM 'gu ya a kra ma d+ha la hUM/ mkhas pa rdo rje slob dpon gyis// ba su ta li rgyu zhugs la// gzungs
77a5(ngi): ma'i lag tu byin brlabs nas// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa// lhag ma byang chub sems kyi thig/ yum gyi mkha' la bde stong 'khyil// rig pa ye shes lnga yi thig/
77a6(ngi): srad bu ye shes lnga'i dang ldan// mtshon pa gzugs brnyan rdul tshon thig/ cha chen cha phran rnam par dbye// oM ma hA du dz+nyA na 'gu ya a kra ma d+ha la hU/ mtha' gnyis ma spros
77a7(ngi): kun nas zlum// chos dbyings skye med gru bzhir rgyas// tshad med sgo dang rab ldan pa'o// le tshe dgu pa'i dkyil 'khor der// snod ni bzhi lam brgyad bzhag la// cha'i
77b1(ngi): grangs dang mnyam ste bsog/ ces gsungs so// bdud rtsi chen po chos nyid gsang ba'i rgyud las/ sta gon du bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// /
77b2(ngi): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sma na ra sa ya na'i sgrub pa'i thabs 'di gsungs so// shu ti ya bag shar dang // ru rta shing dang ra bi pi li// khyi lce ba dang cha ma nyams te/
77b3(ngi): phye ma ga'u kha sbyar nang // bcug nas gzungs thag btags byas nas// sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM ka li ka li ma hA ka li/ ma na sa sho ni/ ta b+ho dza ni/
77b4(ngi): ha na shu la tri shu lenA/ bdag gi nad zhi nas tshe ring bar gyur cig swa hA/ phye ma chu dron sbyar 'thungs na// rlung las gyur pa'i zug gzer dang // sran dang khrag 'khrun pa dang /
77b5(ngi): dbugs mi ba de dang snying nad dang // myos dang drod chung lto spos pa// kha zas mi 'ju khong mo bde// srin bu'i nad dang cham pa dang // shu ba thor bu g.yan pa dang // dregs na mig
77b6(ngi): ser khrag rgyas dang // lkog ma skrangs chu so'i nad// mchin pa dang ni mtsher pa dang // klad pa gzhogs phyed nad pa dang // mig gi nad do cog rnams sel// skabs su sten pas
77b7(ngi): de ltar 'grub// rtag tu gtang bar gyur pa na// spyi ther zla yang skye bar byed// sma nag 'gyur zhing bzhin yang mdzes// smra kar gnyer ma med pa ste// rgyas sra tshe yang ring bar
78a1(ngi): 'gyur/ bcung len ra sa ya nar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi'i rgyal po yis// phye ma sman gyi rgyal po 'di// bram ze gzhon nu sprin la
78a2(ngi): gsungs// de nas srin po'i rna ba ste// ba sgru ba yi rtse ba dang // a ru ra dang sle tre sa dang // skyer ba'i rtsa ba cha bsnyams bskol// bzhi cha lus pa'i nang du ni// gu gul
78a3(ngi): mnyes te bstsags pa'i// khu ba sngags kyis btab 'thungs na// 'or dang skya sbab smra rdzing nang // badra kan las gyur kha ba'i nad// srangs pa'i nad rnams sel ba ste//
78a4(ngi): namachong yan lag nad la phan// oM hu pri hu~M shu kle phu swA hA/ sngags de btab nas chu sbyor blud// sdud cing ma zhu'i nad zhi byed// bcom ldan 'das kyi khu ba'i sman// bsgrub
78a5(ngi): pa'i man ngag cho ga 'di// drang srong rin po che la bshad// kha ru tshwa dang go snyong dang // na le sham dang sha khar// sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin// skyug pa'i nad rnams zhi bar
78a6(ngi): byed/ shing tsha sug smel skyu ru ra// bcu skra tsan dan ma nu dang // ji can ti dang bla sgang dang // ba la dang ni hasti dang // cha bsnyams kar brgyad 'gyur gyi// lde gu byin na
78a7(ngi): skyigs bu'i nang // dbugs mi bde ba zhi bar byed// sngags 'di btags nas sman la bsgrub// gro ga la bris mgul du btags// skyugs pa'i nad rnams zhi bar byed//
78b1(ngi): o he ru ka dz+wa li ti sta dzi he hUM phaT swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong ni// 'ag+he'u ta ma la bshad pa yin// lde gu bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// bi dang ka'i sa bon dang /
78b2(ngi): skyu ru ra dang a ru ra/ 'bras bu ga sum la srang re ste// dur byid srang gsum phye ma ni/ khur srang bcu gnyis bskol nang du// ri lu grangs ni bcu gsum bya// sum cu zla
78b3(ngi): ba re re bza'// mdze nad sha bkra dbugs mi bde// lud pa spu rdzi ji gzhang 'brum dang // gcin nad mtsher nad thor bu'i nad// sran nad rnams la bshal gyis 'joms//
78b4(ngi): a ru ra dang bu ram dang // cha bsnyams sbrang rtsi sbyar ba yis// 'khru bar byed de bcud len drags// oM mo tsa ni bi mo k+Sha ni sid d+hi ka ra ka ra/ phu ru tru tu ru tru swA hA/ bcom
78b5(ngi): ldan 'das kyis bkru ba'i sman// drang srong gzhon nu sred la bshad// ri lu sman gyi bsgrub pa'o// tsha ba gsum dang ser po gnyis// nas tshig bsgrus pa'i thal ba dang //
78b6(ngi): be ru ra'i shing tsha dang // byi sha la dang tsi tra ka/ ka ra bi ra rgya ma tshwa dang // khyim gyi dud pa nyungs kar dang // a sga'i lo ma ban+da sga dang // pha la ta ka mu zi dang // sdong ros

79a1(ngi): dang ma rungs rma// zi gu'i nad dang me dpal dang // mtshan par brdol dang 'bras kyi nad// mdze nad bco brgyad dag la yang // bskus pa tsam
79a2(ngi): gyis nus pa ni// shing la thog gis rgyab pa 'dra// oM a mr-i ta go gza sha ma nA ye swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drang srong mchog/ mgron skyob la ni byug pa bshud// @
79a3(ngi): glang rA dang shing kun dang // sbrul gyi pags pa po sau 'cha// ras ba la sa bon mi yi skra// nas kyi phub ma 'bri ha to// ser po rnam gnyis na le sham// rma bya'i sgro dang shun

79a6(ngi): d+ha kun d+ha/ tsan d+ha bud+d+ha sa ma ye swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong ni// rtsibs kyi mu khyud 'dzin la// dud pas bsrung ba'i cho ga'o// dngul rdo lcug sa rdo brag zhun

79b1(ngi): byang
