85a7(ngi): dbus kyi gtso bo mnga' gsol de// dur khrod gnas na bzhugs nas ni// 'gro ba'i don yang rab mdzad par// dgyes par bzhugs su gsol ba'o// oM AHhU sarba baH
85b1(ngi): a mr-i ta ma hA shrI he ru ka/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri s+thAm/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lha na bskor ba lan gsum bskor byas nas// rdo rje'i pro ni shur du brdung // rin chen lho la pad+ma
85b2(ngi): nub// las kyi zo ni byang nyid de// de nas mtshams bcud bsrung ba dang // mchod pa byin gyis brlab par bya// lus ngag yid kyis nyes byas sbyang // brda sgo brda
85b3(ngi): phyag byin chen dbab// gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag chos nyid ni// ci la yang mi dmigs stong pa'i rang bzhin te// blang dor med pa'i don la mgo yos par// mnyam
85b4(ngi): pa chen po'i ngang du bsgom par bya// oM ma hA shUn+ya ta dz+nyA na swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&hUM/ chos rnams thams cad gdod nas dag pa la// sems kyi rang bzhin kun la khyab
85b5(ngi): par brdu la// thams cad 'byung ba'i ye shes tshon po ste// sems dang ye shes kun la ci yang snang // oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA wa Ad ma ko&haM/ byang chub sems/
85b6(ngi): ni hUM gi rang bzhin te// hUM nyid gdod nas dag pa'i rgyu ru gsal// mngon sum gyur pa thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu// ga sing chen yum lnga ga sang mchog dkyi
85b7(ngi): 'khor gas la// e yaM raM dza bi ka bru e zas ye shes nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor na// dngos dang mtshan nyid thams cad mi dmigs pa// chos kun ye nas dag
86a1(ngi): pa'i ngang nyid ni// mtha' dang dbus med nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// e a ka sha ma d+ha la hU/ yAlas ye shes mthor rlung chen
86a2(ngi): po ni/ bag chags sdug bsngal ye shes rlung gi sa bskyod// de las dbyings phyug dbyings su mnyam sbyar nas// ya las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya/
86a3(ngi): yang kar ma rag sha hU/ raM las me yid dkyil 'khor ni// dngos por snang ba'i bag chags sdug bsngal ba sregs// rin chen dbyings phyug mkha' dang mnyam
86a4(ngi): sbyar nas// raM las me yi dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// raM dz+wa la ma d+ha la hU/ ra las ye shes khrag gi dkyil 'khor ni// 'dod chags 'khor ba'i sdug
86a5(ngi): bsngal gtan sbyangs te// pad+ma dbyings phyug mkha' dang mnyam sbyar nas// ra las rag ta'i dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// ra ra ga ta ma d+ha la hUM/ ba las zhing
86a6(ngi): chen gtams pa'i sa gzhi ni// zad mid gter chen rdo rje rgya gram gau tams// sangs rgyas dbyings phyug mkha' dang mnyam sbyar nas/ kha las zhing chen sa gzhi
86a7(ngi): bskyed par bya/ kha tir ma d+ha la d+hu/ kun tu bzang mo yum gyi mkha' klong nas// mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje bstan pa'i rgyu// srid gsum 'degs byed bya ba nan tan
86b1(ngi): ye shes bzhir gyur rang bzhin kun la khyab// rak+ta'i rgya mtsho yum gyi mkha' klong nas// thams cad skyed byed yul gyi byang chub sems// dus gsum
86b2(ngi): 'du 'bral med par chags pa'i klong // rang bzhin rnam dag pad+ma ra ga'i klong // keng rus ri rab rdo rje brag stengs na// dregs pa bsgral nas zhe
86b3(ngi): sdang phung po bshig/ chags med rag ta'i dkyil 'khor rang byung ba// bcom ldan drapal chen yab yum bzhugs pa'ig nas// 'bru las bskyed pa'i 'bar ba'i
86b4(ngi): gzhal yas khang // phyogs bcu kun tu rgya yongs ma chad pa'i// byi dang nang med ye shes gsal ba'i dang // rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i bzhugs gnas so//
86b5(ngi): oM 'gu h+ma a kra ma d+ha la hU/ 'gu h+la gsang chen byang chub sems kyi thig/ rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i dkyi la 'khor la// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi thig
86b6(ngi): btab pas// ma 'dal brgyad pa mtha' dbus med par gsal// mtha' gnyis ma smos lte ba zlum po la// lte dbus thig bzhi btab pas le'u tshe dgu// dbus
86b7(ngi): su dbang chen zla gam dmar po la// 'jigs byed mthing nag gru gsum 'bar bas brgyan// chags med pad+ma 'dab brgyad brdal ba la// ye shas brgyad spros 'khor lo
87a1(ngi): rtsibs brgyad pa// rin chen zur brgyad yon tan sna tshogs 'phro// mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje'i ra bas bskor// 'bar 'phro thugs rje'i
87a2(ngi): 'od zer mang po 'khrug/ ye shes bzhi ldan gru chad bzhi yis brgyan// 'bar ba chen po'i bar khyams rab tu mdzes// ye shes sgo bzhi rta babs brgyad dang ldan/
87a3(ngi): ban+d+ha d+ha skam rlon mang po'i rtsog pa la// gan ma lcags ngur mo 'bar ba'i gzer gyis gtag/ zhing chen po mo bsnol bu'i ka gdung la// zhing thun mang po bltams
87a4(ngi): ba'i bral byam btang // zhing rkyen ga yang gzhi blo bre 'phan gdugs dang // ban d+ha'i po rdo sbrul nag chun po dang // nyi zla gza' skar mang po'i tshogs kyis brgyan
87a5(ngi): khams gsum kun tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor khyab// bru 'guh+ma ma d+ha la bruM/ nor bu mu tig gcal du legs par bkram// ad ma gar ba'i 'od kyis
87a6(ngi): phyogs bcur 'khrigs// nor bu rin po che yi zug tu gtams// rdo rje rtse gcig rtse gsum rtse lnga dang // ma ni shes rab 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang // dbyings
87a7(ngi): kyi thugs rjes mtha' dbus med par khyab// nyi mi'am 'dal gnad kyi khyab par ni// snang ba ma 'gegs yongs la khyab par bsgom// ma sUr+ya ma d+ha la hU/
87b1(ngi): ma skyes thabs kyi rang bzhin te// reg pa byang chub sems kyi thig le che// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyam par rab snang ba// mtha' dbus med par gdod nas dag par
87b2(ngi): bsgom/ a tsan+d+ra ma d+ha la hU/ ba ni pad+ma dmar po'i mdog/ 'dod chags thams cad dbang bsdus yum gyi mkha'// pad+ma'i ge sar chos kyi dbu 'bad nas// ji ltar
87b3(ngi): 'byung ba'i 'gyur ba'i ma 'dal bsgom// pa pad+ma maN+Da wa hUM/ hUM s+pha ra na phaT/ sang ha ra na hU/ badz+ra shrI he ru ka badz+ra ka ya/ badz+ra kro d+hi shwa rI sta/ bcom ldan dpa'
87b4(ngi): chen he ru ka/ sku mdog mthing ka 'jigs byed rgyan gyi sa brgyan// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje ban d+har 'khrug/ zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs//
87b5(ngi): oM A hU/ sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA wa Ad ma ko&ha/ sarba ta thA ga ta bA ga badz+ra swa b+ha wa Ad ma ko&ha/ sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko&ha/ sarba ta
87b6(ngi): thA ga ta ra da na 'gu ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko&ha/ sarba ta tha ga ta kar ma badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko&haM/ byol song gtso bo brgyad kyi gdan stangs na/
87b7(ngi): 'jigs byed chen po khro bo chen po bcu// hUM chen sngo skya rdo rje nyi zla bsnams// rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje tir dkar// dbyug pa ljang sngon dbyug tom lha 'dzin// gshin rje
88a1(ngi): mthing nAg rin chen grul bum bsnams// mi g.yo smyug nag ral gri srin po thogs// rta mgrin dmar po sbrul zhags khyud chen gshog/ mi thub dmar
88a2(ngi): skya ba dan rlung lha 'dzin// bdud rtsi ldang nag rgya gram gnod sbyin bsnams// khams gsum ser ljang ne'u le bgegs chen bzungs// stobs chen dud ka thong gshol gtun
88a3(ngi): shing bsnams// badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha hU kA ra hU/ badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha bi dza ya hU/ badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hU/ badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha ya mAn tA ka hU/ badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hU/
88a4(ngi): badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha ha ya shrI ba hU/ badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha a ba rA dzI ta d+hu/ badz+ra ma hA kr-i d+ha a mr-i ti kun Ti li hU~M/ badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha tre log kye bi dza ya sh+tsa/ badz+ra ma ny+dzu kr-i d+ha ma hA ba la hru
88a5(ngi): oM bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka/ badz+ra shrI he ru ka/ ra ta na shrI he ru ka/ bad ma shrI he ru ka/ ka ra ma shrI he ru ka/ bi shwa sa nu shri he ru ka/ 'gu h+ma sa ma ya shri he ru ka/ yag sha shrI
88a6(ngi): he ru ka/ rag sha shrI he ru ka/ rang byung khro rgyal bcu yi da bu stang sa su// khrag 'thung chen po gleng dgu he ru ka/ ye shes chen po dgu rnams lhun grub pa// bcom ldan
88a7(ngi): khrag 'thung bud+d+ha chen po ni// dbu gsum g.yas ser g.yon dmar dbus ma smug/ phyag drug 'khor lo dgra sta zhags pa g.yas// ban d+ha rde'u chung kha T+wAM g.yon na bsnams//
88b1(ngi): bcom ldan khrag thung rdo rje chen po ni// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon dmar mthing nag sku// phyag drug rdo rje kha T+Ta tir g.yas// rgyu dmar rgyu zhags zhing chen
88b2(ngi): khyung gi khra// bcom ldan khrag 'thung rin chen chen po ni// dbu gsum sngo nag ser dang dmar ba'i zhal// rin chen gshol dang gtun shing dbyug to g.yas//
88b3(ngi): ban d+ha dgra sta gtun shing rde'u chung g.yon// bcom ldan pad+ma khrag 'thung chen po ni// dbu gsum dmar nag sngo dang ldang dkar zhal// g.yas pa pad+ma rde'u chung spu
88b4(ngi): gri bsnams/ khan d+ha khaT+Ta thod 'phreng g.yon pa na// bcom ldan las rab khrag 'thung chen po ni// dbu gsum ldang nag dmar sar dkar ba'i zhal// rgya gram ral
88b5(ngi): gri zhags parje'u chung g.yas// ban d+harje'u dril bu kha TA dbyug/ bcom ldan khrag 'thung sna tshogs chen po ni// zhal gsum dkar po g.yas mthing g.yon pa
88b6(ngi): dkar/ phyag drug gi khug rdo rje kha tra g.yas// thod po dril bu rje'u chung g.yon na bsnams// bcom ldan khrag 'thung gsang ba chen po ni// zhal gsum g.yas
88b7(ngi): dkar g.yon dmar dbus ma ser// gri khug rin chen be tsa na g.yas pa na// thod ba dril bu cang te'u g.yon na bsnams// bcom ldan khrag 'thung gnod sbyin chen po ni//
89a1(ngi): zhal gsum dmar po g.yas mthing g.yon pa sngo// gri khug pad+ma dgra sta g.yas pa ni// thod pa dril bu 'ang+ga ma ru ni g.yon// bcom ldan khrag/
89a2(ngi): 'thung srin po chen po ni// zhal gsum ljang kug yas dkar g.yon pa dmar// gri khug rgya gram ral gri g.yas pa na// thod pa dril bu rde'u g.yon pa na// mi gnas ye
89a3(ngi): shes chen po'i klong dkyil du// sku gdung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// mu phaT kro d+hi shwa rI sa ma stam/ ye shes khrag 'thung dgu'i dbus stengs su// mkha'
89a4(ngi): mnyam klong gi dkyil 'khor rnam zhal ma// dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad zhabs kyang brgyad// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rje dung dmar dkrug cing gsol// g.yas brgyad ko'u
89a5(ngi): ri chos nyid bdud rtsir sbyor// g.yon brgyad 'phra men 'khor ba bdud rtsir sbyor// b+ha ga'i klong du rdo rje'i smin mtshams nub// ye shes dgu rnams dbyings kyi b+ha gar thim//
89a6(ngi): hUM badz+ra ma hA shrI he ru ka hU~M ma hA dz+wa la ra/ gsang ba yum gyi dbu steng gnas bzhugs pa/ 'chi med rdo rje che mchog he ru ka/ dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig smug nag 'bar// mar me'i
89a7(ngi): rgyal po rin chen gtsug phud dang // tshe dpag med dang rnam par gzigs pa dang // rin chen mang dang gtsug tor shAkya thub// gser phye dri bral snang ba dpag med dang // nyi ma'i
89b1(ngi): dkyil 'khor spobs pa brtsegs pa dang // seng ge 'bum gzigs seng ge rnam par rol// yon tan kun 'od ri yi rgyal po dang // byams pa kun gzigs kun nas 'od zer
89b2(ngi): dang / dpal brtsegs rgyal po rdo rje rnam par gnon// rnam dag sku dang sa la'i rgyal po bzhugs// 'khor lo mchod rten rin chen rgyal mtshan bcu// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
89b3(ngi): phyag mtshan bsnams pa ni// sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bdud rtsis mchod// zhabs brgyad rdo rje yum gyi b+ha gar 'jig/ gnam zhal bdud rtsi 'o ma bcud kyis 'bebs//
89b4(ngi): dkyil 'khor bar khyams drang srong ti shu rtsa gcig/ sgo bzhi lha mo sman gyi srungs ma bzhi// klu bdag rta mgrin me rlung thod pa ste// mi thub ro langs za byed rgyas 'debs ma//
89b5(ngi): steng 'og hU dang stobs chen khro bo bsrungs// bdud rtsi sman gyi pho brang bsrungs mar bzhugs// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs bzhugs su gsol// phyag 'tshal bdud
89b6(ngi): rtsi rag ta ga tor mar 'bul// thugs dam bskul bstod gsang ba'i glu dbyangs blangs// rol mo'i sgra dang bro stabs gar gyis brjid// 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang
89b7(ngi): nas/ chos sku skye ba med pa'i dbyings nyid las// longs sku ye shes sgyu ma'i skur snang ba// bdud rtsi yon tan lha tshogs spyan 'dren pa// dus gsum sangs rgyas sku yi rgyan du
90a1(ngi): bzhugs// ma mo mkha' 'gro phyag mtshan sprul pa 'gyed// 'bar ba'i gar dgus gdul bya so sor 'dul// che mchog ru spyan 'dren
90a2(ngi): 1gshegs su gsol// spyan gyi lnga stangs mkha' spyod mkha' 'gro bsdud// gnas yul ma mo phyag mtshan pho nya mdzad// b+ha ga bde stong klong nas khrag 'thung 'char//
90a3(ngi): khro mo dbyings phyug spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// sku ni klong dgu khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i sku// gsung gi sgra dbyangs rma 'byung gsang sngags 'chad// thugs ni ye
90a4(ngi): shes chen po gsal ba'i ngang // dgu slong he ru ka rnams gshegs su gsol// bdud rtsi sman gyi pho brang rta mgrin sku// gsang ba yum bzhi'i mkha' la sbyor ba mdzad//
90a5(ngi): hUM mdzad stobs chen me rlung las kyis sbor// rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol// mi dge bcur smin phyogs skyong rnam par 'dul// dge bcu
90a6(ngi): mtho ris thar pa'i lam yang ston// rang 'byung dkyil 'khor ma lus bsrungs mdzad pa li// mthar byed khro rgyal rnams yang gshegs su gsol// oM e h+ye haM
90a7(ngi): b+ha ga bA na/ ma hA kA ru ni ga dzaHhUM baM ho/ byol song gtso bo brgyad kyi khro stengs su// stong gsum khro ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhugs su gsol// rta khri khro bo brgyad
90b1(ngi): kyi dbu stengs su// sku gdung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhugs su gsol// grong dgu he ru ka yi dbu stengs su// mkha' mnyam klong gi dkyil 'khor bzhugs
90b2(ngi): su gsol// khro mo dbyings phyag ma yi de bu stengs su// 'chi med rdo rje'i dekyil 'khor bzhugs su gsol// oM ma hA man+da la kA ya bAg tsit+ta tiSh+Ta lhan/ dur
90b3(ngi): khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// bdud rtsi sman gyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i lha// khro rgyal bgegs dpung 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo// khrag 'thung
90b4(ngi): ye shes klong dgu phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' spyod dbang sdud yum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'chi med rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pu ho/ pra ti dza ho/ a
90b5(ngi): la la ho/ khrag 'thung rgyal po ga ra la dgyes// g.yas su thabs gsum bskyod byas pas// zhe sdang rtsa ba cad thugs mchog sgrol// g.yon du thabs ga sum
90b6(ngi): bskyod byas pas// 'dod chags rtsad bcad gsung mchog sgrol// dbus su thabs gsum bskyod byas pas// gti mug cad bcad sku mchog sgrol// g.yas
90b7(ngi): g.yon thams dang shes rab ste// sbyar bas phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu// khro bdag chen po phyag rgya ni// smug nag cir yang 'gyur ba'i sku// nyi shu rtsa gcig dbu dang ldan/
91a1(ngi): bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis phyag mtshan ni// g.yas g.yon dang po phyag gnyis no// kun bzangs thabs dang shes rab bsnams// de 'og g.yas
91a2(ngi): g.yon bcu po ni// rigs lnga thabs dang shes rab bsnams// de 'og g.yas g.yon brgyad po na// nang gi sems dpa' yab yum bsnams// de 'og g.yas
91a3(ngi): g.yon brgyad po na// phyi yi sems dpa' yab yum bsnams// de 'og g.yas g.yon brgyad po na// rnam thar sgo ba yab yum bsnams// de 'og g.yas g.yon drug
91a4(ngi): bo na/ rigs drug 'dul byed thub drug bsnams// zhab sa brgyad khro mo'i dbu brgyad mnan// gsang yum thabs dang shes rab sbyor// gnam zhal khro mo'i phyag
91a5(ngi): rgya ni// sku mdog skyug nag dbu dgu la/ bco brgyad phyag ni dang po gnyis// rdo rje dung dmar dkrug cing gsol// g.yas brgyad ke'u ma brgyad bsnams/
91a6(ngi): g.yon brgyad 'phra men ma brgyad bsnams// zhabs brgyad khrag 'thung dbu stengs brdzis// phyag rgya'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// badz+ra he ru ka'i phyag rgya ni//
91a7(ngi): g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// rdo rje zhing dbyug kha T+wAM g.yas// ba na d+ha zhing chen rgyu zhags khra// bud+d+ha he ru ka'i phyag rgya ni// dkar ser dmar
91b1(ngi): sdor dbus spyug zhal// 'khor lor gra sta nags pa g.yas// ban d+ha rnge'u chung khwa tong g.yon// radwa na sne ru ka'i byug rgya no// g.yas ser g.yon dmar dbus
91b2(ngi): ma ser// rin chen gshol dbyug gtun shing g.yas// ban d+ha dgra sta gtun shing g.yon// pad ma he ru'i phyag rgya ni// dkar sngo sngo ldang dbus ma dmar/
91b3(ngi): pad ma rde'u chung ral gri g.yas// ban d+ha kha T+wAM gser thod 'phreng // ka ra ma he ru'i phyag rgya ni// dkar dmar ser dkar ljang nag dbus// rgya gram ral gri zhags
91b4(ngi): pa rba/ ba na d+ha thod rnga kha T+wAM dril// bi shA sa nu he ru ka/ ga ya sa mthing dbus dka ra g.yon pa dmar// gri khug rdo rje kha tang g.yas// thod pa dril bu rje'u chung g.yon/
91b5(ngi): dam tshag gsang ba'i he ru kaM/ g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ma ser// gri khug rin chen be con ga yas// thod pa dril bu cang the'u g.yon// gnod sbyin khrag 'thung
91b6(ngi): phyag rgya ni// g.yas mthing g.yon sngo dbus mdamar// gri khyeg pad ma dgra sta g.yas// thod pa dril bu da ma ru// srin po khrag 'thung phyag rgya ni// ka ya sa ser g.yon
91b7(ngi): dmar dbus ma ljang // gri zhug rgya gram ral gri g.yas// thod pa dril bu rnga'u chung g.yon// 'bar ba'i gdan las bzhengs nas kyang // phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa ba zhes//
92a1(ngi): hUM mdzad sngo skya 'bar ba la// rdo rje rtse mo 'khor los mtshan// g.yon pa nyi zla'i rkang pa bzungs// rnam par rgyal ba sku mdog dkar// rdo rje
92a2(ngi): g.yas la tir g.yon// dro byug pa sngon po ldang sngon sku// g.yas kyi sa dbyug to me dpung 'bar// g.yon pa me lha'i rkang pa bzung // gshin rje mthing nag rin chen
92a3(ngi): dbyug/ g.yon pa grul bu ma rkang pa bzung // mi g.yo smug nag ral gri g.yas// g.yon pa srin po dbyug par 'phyar// rta mgrin dmar po byi ru'i mdangs//
92a4(ngi): g.yas pa ti ra sbrul gyi sa dkris// g.yon pa khyung chen gshog pa rde bas// gzhan gyis mi thub dmar skya'i mdog/ g.yas pa rlung yab mi mgo sa brgyan// g.yon
92a5(ngi): ba rlung lha'i zhabs nas bzung // bdud rtsi ldang nag rgya gra ma g.yas// g.yon pa gnod sbyin dbyug par phyar// khams gsum rnam rgyal ser ljang ku// ne'u le
92a6(ngi): g.yas la bgegs chen g.yon/ 'bar ba'i ga da na la sa bzhengs nas kyang // phyag rgya gar gyi mchod par bzhes// rang 'byung gdod nas rnam par dag/ dam
92a7(ngi): rdzas bdud rtsi chen po ni// 'chi med dkyil 'khor che mchog dang // mkha' mnyam dkyil 'khor gnam zhal ma// sku gdung dkyil 'khor dgu klong nas// mthar
92b1(ngi): byed dkyil 'khor lo rgyal bcu// bdud rtsi dkyil 'khor rta mgrin dbang // mchod par 'bul lo kha ra khA ci// dam rdzas bdud rtsi sbyar bar// yid bzhin
92b2(ngi): rin rkyen ka pA la// 'bru gsum 'thungs pas sku gsung thugs// mi zad rgyan gyi dngos grub thob// oM AHsU/ kA ya bAg tsit+ta sid+d+hi hU~M/ a ho su ka d+harma ka la
92b3(ngi): sid+d+hi hUM/ de nas bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka la/ rigs 'dzin rnams kyis bstod pa/ dur khrod 'bar ba klong gi dkyil 'khor na// shin
92b4(ngi): tu mi bzad 'bar ba'i skur ston cing // yang gsang rgyas pa'i tshe mchog he ru ka/ sku mdog mthing nag mi 'gyur chos kyi sku// nyi shu rtsa gcig sa rnams lhun gyis
92b5(ngi): grub/ khro rgyal ye shes dbu ni stobs po che// dang po rab tu dga' ba'i sa dang sbyor// bdud 'dul ye shes dbu ni khams gsum rgyal// gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i sa
92b6(ngi): dang sbyor// rtog 'joms ye shes dbu ni bdud rtsi 'khyil// gsum pa 'od du 'phro ba'i sa dang sbyor// sbrul sku ye shes dbu ni gzhan ma thug// bzhi pa 'od byed pa yis
92b7(ngi): dang sbyor// zil gnon ye shes dbu ni rta mgrin dpal// lnga pa sbyang bar dka' ba'i sa dang sbyor// rnam dag ye shes bu ni mi g.yo mgon// drug pa mngon du gyur pa'i
93a1(ngi): sa dang sbyar// thabs mkhas ye shes dbu ni gshin rje gshed// bdun pa ring du song ba'i sa dang sbyor// rtogs ldan ye shes dbu ni
93a2(ngi): dbyug sngon can// brgyad pa mi g.yo ba yi sa dang sbyor// mkhyen gsal ye shes da bu ni rnam par rgyal// dgu pa legs pa blo gros sa dang sbyor// brjid gnon ye
93a3(ngi): shes dbu ni hU ka ra// bcu pa chos kyi sprin gyi sa rang sbyor// mngon sangs ye shes yag sha he ru ka/ bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyi sa dang sbyor// kun mkhyen ye shes
93a4(ngi): b+hi sha he ru ka/ ma chags pad ma brgyan gyi sa dang sbyor// byams mgon ye shes sa nu he ru ka/ yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen sa dang sbyor// rnga ma brjid ye shes rag
93a5(ngi): sha he ru ka/ skye med rdo rje 'dzin gyi sa dang sbyor// dpa' brjid ye shes ka ra ma he ru ka/ rnam dag stug po bkod pa'i sa dang sbyor// skyon sel ye shes pad ma
93a6(ngi): he ru ka/ chags med 'thug po bkod pa'i sa dang sbyor// sgrib sel ye shes rang na he ru ka/ mtshan rdzogs rdo rje 'chang gi sa dang sbyor// 'bar 'phro ye shes bud+d+ha
93a7(ngi): he ru ka/ chos nyid bde ba chen po'i sa dang sbyor// rtogs ldan ye shes badz+ra he ru ka/ ma spangs ye shes bla ma'i sa dang sbyor// lhun grub ye shes dpal chen he ru
93b1(ngi): ka kun bzangs dbye ba med pa'i sa dang sbyor// za byed chos ni chos mchog he ru ka/ lhun grub yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa dang sbyor// ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs la
93b2(ngi): phyag 'tshal bstod// yang sangs rgyas pa'i tshe mchog he ru ka/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis phyag mtshan mngon sangs rgyas// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi dang po na// byed
93b3(ngi): pa yid bzhin kun bzangs rdo rje bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi dang po ni// kun bzangs bya ba mnyam bzhag pad+ma 'phro// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi
93b4(ngi): dang 'og na// rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi 'khor lo bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi 'og ma nu// bskyed mdzad sangs rgyas spyan ni thor tshugs bsnams//
93b5(ngi): bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi gsum pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyod rdo rje bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi gsum pa na// kun tu bzang mo mtha' stong
93b6(ngi): dril bu bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bzhi pa na// rin chen 'byung ldan mchod sbyin re bskor bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bzhi pa na//
93b7(ngi): ma ma ki ni sdud byed rdo rje bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi lnga pa na// snang ba mtha' yas dbang sdud pad+ma bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi lnga pa na//
94a1(ngi): gos dkar mo ni be sreg byed zhugs mar bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi drug pa na// don yod grub pa rdo rje rgyu gra ma bsnams/
94a2(ngi): bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi drug pa na// dam tshig sgrol ma bskyod mdzad ut+pa la bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bdun pa na// sa yi snying por rini chen myu gu
94a3(ngi): bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bdun pa na// lA sa dkar mo me long rgya gram bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi brgyad pa na// nam mkha' slong
94a4(ngi): po gcod byed ral gri bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi brgyad pa na// mA le sngon mo rin chen 'phreng ba bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi dgu pa na/
94a5(ngi): spyan ra sa gzigs dbang ma chags pad+ma bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi dgu pa na// 'gir ti dmar mo po wang rgyud mangs bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
94a6(ngi): ga yas kyi bcu pa na// phyag na rdo rje 'joms byed rdo rje bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu pa na// nai re ti ljang ku gar gyi bcod pan bsnams// bzhi
94a7(ngi): bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu gcig na// byams pa chen po bdud rtsi 'gu d+he bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu gcig na/ bdug pa'i sprin 'phro ma ni
94b1(ngi): spos me bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu gnyis na// sgrib pa rnam se la klu shing lo ma bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu gnyis na// /
94b2(ngi): dga' ba'i me dang sna ldan mas ni me tog bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu gsum na// kun tu bzang po rin chen snyam bsnams// bzhi bcu
94b3(ngi): rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu gsum na// gsal ba'i 'od ldan rnams kyi zhun mar bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu bzhin// 'jam dpal gzhon nu ut+pa
94b4(ngi): mthing ka bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu bzhin// rtog bral dgyes mdzad ma ni dri che ba bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bco lnga na//
94b5(ngi): bgeg sa che ni mthur byed rdung byed the ba bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bco ldan// thugs dam skul byed mA ni lcags kyu bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa
94b6(ngi): gnyis g.yas kyi bcu drug na// gshin rje mthar byed tshogs pa'i dbyug tho bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu drug ni// gnas na ma bskyod mdzad ma
94b7(ngi): ni zhags bzasnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu bdun na// pad+ma mthar byed 'gugs pa'i sbrul zhags bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi
95a1(ngi): bcu bdun na// rtog bral bzhugs mdzad ma ni lcags sgrogs bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bco brgyad na// shes rab
95a2(ngi): mthar byed gcod mdza da ral gri bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bco brgyad na// tshangs pa'i gsung sgrog ma ni dril bu bsnams/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
95a3(ngi): g.yas kyi bcu dgu na// lha yi thub pa bi wa nga rgyud 'dren pasnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu dgu na// byol song thub pa 'chad pa'i po ti bsnams//
95a4(ngi): bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi nyi shu na// lha min thub pa thag bzangs go chu bsnams/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi nyi shu na// yi dag sa thub pa rin chen sgrom bu
95a5(ngi): bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi tha ma na// mi yi thub pa gsil byed par bu bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi tha ma na// dmyal ba'i thub pa me
95a6(ngi): chu ba sil drod bsnams// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa las// dbyings la ye shes che la mnga' brnyes pa'i// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal
95a7(ngi): bstod/ b+hu yang sangs rgyas pa'i me mchog he ru ka/ ting 'dzin zhabs brgyad khro mong bu brgyad mnan// rig pa yul la sbyar ba'i dbyings la sbyor// zhabs
95b1(ngi): brgyad g.yas kyi dang po ni// thig le chen po'i ting 'dzin chen po dang // chags pa med pas mchog gi dbyings dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yas kyi gnyis pa
95b2(ngi): bsgral bas ni// bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin chen po dang // klong du gyur pa chos kyi dbyings dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yas kyi gsum pa bgrad pas ni// rdo rje lta
95b3(ngi): bu'i ting 'dzin chen po dang // 'gyur ba med pa chos kyi dbyings dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yas kyi tha ma bgrang ba ni// thams cad 'byung ba'i ting 'dzin chen po dang //
95b4(ngi): zad pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yon gyi dang po bgrad pas ni// chags pa med pa'i ting 'dzin chen po dang // ye nas dag pa'i chos kyi
95b5(ngi): dbyings dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yon gyi gnyis pa bgrang pas ni// 'da' bar dkar ba'i ting 'dzin chen po dang // gtong ba med pa'i chos kyi dbyings su
95b6(ngi): sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yon gyi gsum pa bgrang pas ni// dmigs pa med pa'i ting 'dzin chen po dang // rang bzhin med pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang sbyor// zhabs
95b7(ngi): brgyad g.yon gyi tha ma bgrad pas ni// skye shi med pa'i ting 'dzin chen po dang // 'du 'bral med pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang sbyor// gsang ba'i zhal du rdo rje phyed nub pas//
96a1(ngi): kun tu bzang mo'i ting 'dzin chen po dang // khyab brdal chen po chos kyi dbyings dang sbyor// kun tu bzang mo'i byang sems thig ler zhu//
96a2(ngi): 'chi med rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor de min nam// che mchog he ru ka la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'jigs byed chen po 'bar ba'i zhabs 'og nas// shin tu rngam pa'i khro mo
96a3(ngi): gnam zhal ma// sku mdog dung kha sna tshogs cir yang ston// dbu dgu chos dbyings ye shes dgu dang sbyor// stong pa bco brgyad phyag ni rtag chad sgrol//
96a4(ngi): klong dgu zhabs ni khrag 'thung dgu dang rol// zhubs brgyud g.yas kyi dang po gdengs pa ni// spungs pa med pa'i b+ha ga chen po dang // thig le chen po byang chub
96a5(ngi): sems dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yas kyi gnyis pa gdengs pa ni// klong dgu pa'i gsang ba'i b+ha ga dang // bde ba chen po byang chub sems dang sbyor//
96a6(ngi): zhabs brgyad g.yas kyi gsum pa gdengs pa ni// 'gyur ba med pa gsang ba'i b+ha ga dang // rdo rje lta bu'i byang chub sems dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yas kyi tha
96a7(ngi): ma gdengs pa ni// zad pa med pa'i gsang ba'i b+ha ga dang // thams cad 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yon gyi dang po gdengs pa ni//
96b1(ngi): gdod nas dag pa'i b+ha ga dang // chags pa med pa'i byang chub sems dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yon gyi gnyis pa gdengs pa ni// stong pa chen po gsang ba'i
96b2(ngi): b+ha ga dang // 'da' bar dka' ba'i byang chub sems dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yon gyi gsum pa gdengs pa ni// rang bzhin med pa'i gsang ba'i b+ha ga dang // dmigs
96b3(ngi): pa med pa'i byang chub sems dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yon gyi tha ma gdeng sra ba ni// 'du 'bral med pa gsang ba'i b+ha ga dang // skye shi med pa'i byang chub sems
96b4(ngi): dang sbyor// gsang ba pad+ma b+ha ga'i klong dkyil na// gsang ba'i rdo rje gsad pa'i dbyings su nub// brdal khyab chen po gsang ba'i gsung // lhun gyis grub pa'i byang
96b5(ngi): chub sems dang sbyor// bde ba byang chub sems ni thig ler zhu// mkha' mnyam klong gi dkyil 'khor de min nam// sa nu kro ti rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod//
96b6(ngi): shin tu 'bar ba'i khro mo zhabs 'og nas// khrag 'thung chen po klong dgu he ru ka/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum gnan// 'jig rten dregs pa'i khyo
96b7(ngi): shug dbang phyug dang // mya ngan mdas pa'i khro bcu zhabs kyis gnon// thugs kyi gdung 'tsho ba badz+ra he ru ka/ rdo rje dbyings phyug mkha' klong dag pa nas// thabs
97a1(ngi): rang shes rab 'du 'bral yongs kyis med// byang chub sems ni dul zhul rin po che// me long lta bu'i ye shes de min nam// rdo rje lta bu
97a2(ngi): 1sru la phyag 'tshal lo// sku yi ga dung 'tsho ba 'bu ta he ru ka/ mkha' la dbyings phyug mkha' klong dag pas na// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral yongs kyi sa med/
97a3(ngi): byang chub sems ni gser mdog rin po che// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes de min nam// 'byung gnas chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan gdung 'tsho ba
97a4(ngi): rang na he ru ka/ rin chen dbyings phyug mkha' 'gro dag pas na// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral yongs kyis med// byang chub sems ni bai DUR+Ya yi mdog/ mnyam
97a5(ngi): ba nyid kyi ye shes de min nam// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// gsung gi gdung 'tsho ba pad+ma he ru ka/ pad+ma dbyings phyug mkha' klong dag pa nas/
97a6(ngi): thabs dang shes rab 'du 'a bral yongs kyis med// byang chub sems ni pad+ma ra ga'i mdog/ so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes de min nam// mngon par byang chub sku la phyag
97a7(ngi): 'tshal lo// 'phrin las gdung 'tsho ba karma he ru ka/ las kyi dbyings phyug mkha' grong dag pas na// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral yongs kyi sa med// byang chub
97b1(ngi): sems ni in tra ni la'i mdog/ bya ba nan tan ye shes de min nam// sprul pa mthar phyin sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rnam shes mthar phyir bi ga sha he ru ka/ bde ba
97b2(ngi): za byed mkha' klong dag pas na// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral yongs kyis med// 'da' ka thugs kyi ye shes de min nam// dmigs med chos kyi sku la phyag
97b3(ngi): 'tshal lo// gnod sems mthar phyin dam chog he ru ka/ bde ba tshe 'phel mkha' klong dag pa nas// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral yongs kyis med// dbyings
97b4(ngi): su 'gro ba'i ye shes de min nam// ngo bo nyid kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// sbyor ba mthar phyin yag sha he ru ka/ bde ba rgyas 'debs mkha' klong dag pa nas// thabs
97b5(ngi): dang shes rab 'du 'bral yongs kyi sa med// klong du gyur pa'i ye shes de min nam// bde ba chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrol ba mthar phyi na ra ga sha he ru ka/

97b7(ngi): la phyag 'tshal lo// sku gsung 'ab ma'i dkyil 'khor de yin mam/ slong dgu he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// chu gsung 'bar ba'i khro bo'idapas 'og nas/
98a1(ngi): hUM mdzad 'dod chags rgyal po nyi zla 'dul// rnam rgyal ma byin len pa'i dri za 'dul// dbyug sngon me lha log par lta ba 'dul// gshin
98a2(ngi): rje srog gcod grul bum 'chi ba dag 'dul// mi g.yo dga' khyal smra ba'i srin po 'dul// rta mgrin phra ma skyel ba'i klu rnams 'dul// mi thub rdzun du smra ba'i rlung lha
98a3(ngi): 'dul/ bdud rtsi tshig rtsub smra ba'i gnod sbyin 'dul// khams gsum gnod sems can gyi bgegs rnams 'dul// stobs chen brna ba sems can gyis bdag
98a4(ngi): 'dul// mthar byed khro rgyal bcu po de min nam// stong gsum khro bo'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// yang sangs rgyas pa'i tshe mchog he ru ka/ mi ga nas mya ngan 'das

98a6(ngi): bu sku gsung thugs ni lhun gyi sa grub// smin mtshams khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba ni// ma rig rmongs pa'i 'khor ba'i mun khung du// thugs rje chen po'i ye shes
98a7(ngi): glog 'gyus pa'o// 'bar ba'i spyan bgrad byams mgon ye re gzigs// g.yas kyi rtsa gcig sdang mig zhe la gnon// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal zhe la mnon te
98b1(ngi): gzigs// g.yon gyi rtsa gcig zur mig bzlog ste gzegs// ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal phyag mas 'debs// dbus kyi rtsa gcig dbus su ye
98b2(ngi): gzigs// 'gyur med chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos pa'o// shangs nas bskal ba'i rlung dmar langs pas ni// 'khor ba'i yul las rgyal te mya ngan 'das//
98b3(ngi): gsal la ma chags ye shes nyi zla'i snyan// nyon mongs tsha bas gdungs pa'i sdug bsngal bsal// sgra nyid rang bzhin med de sgra mthar stong // rngam pa'i zhal
98b4(ngi): gdangs dbyings kyi zhal ho du// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ril ming mdzad// ting 'dzin rno dpal mche ba zang yag gtsigs// skye shi rtsad gcod
98b5(ngi): mya ngan 'das par sbyor// le'u brgan ljags kyis thog dang bu yug 'bebs// rgyu drug 'khor ba'i skam grog thugs rje'i sbubs// ba spu thu lum rtse la ma 'bar
98b6(ngi): te/ rtsa nas khrag 'bab khol mar 'khrug pa la// mtshogs 'bum gyi rgyal mor gnas bcas pa'o// rdo rje sder me lcags kyu 'dzings pa yis// skye
98b7(ngi): ragu'i rtsad bcad theg dgu'i sa la bkod// rin chen gshog pa 'jig rten log par bkab// rigs 'dzin mang po sku yi dpung gnyen mdzad// hUMn yang sangs
99a1(ngi): rgyas pa'i tshe mchog he ru ka/ dur khrod chen po 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs// sku stong tshangs pa'i ga yang gzhi gsol ba ni// 'khor
99a2(ngi): ba zhing gi log rtog tshar bcad nas// 'bras bu longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mnyes pa'o// sku smad stag gi sham thabs ga sol ba ni// dpa' bo chen po'i
99a3(ngi): chas su zhugs pa'i rtags// 'phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro don mthar phyin pa// 'bras bu sprul pa chen po'i sku brnyes pa'o// glang chen ko rlon na bzar
99a4(ngi): gsol ba ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi ngang las ma g.yos par// 'bar ba'i gar dgus cir yang thogs med pas// 'bras bu chos kyi sku nyid brnyes pa'o// /
99a5(ngi): thod pa mang po sa sku la brgyan pa ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur 'bul ba'i phyir// gti mug rmongs pa'i mun pa kun ba sal nas// 'bras
99a6(ngi): bu ngo bo nyid kyi sku brnyes pa'o// sbrul nag stong gi chun pos brgyan pa ni// gdug pa'i klu rigs dbang du kun bsdu sa nas// zhe sdang 'khor ba rtsad nas
99a7(ngi): bcad nas kyang // 'bras bu rdo rje lta bu'i sku brnyes pa'o// kro tha a ma dza thal chen tshom bus brgyan// don dam gnyis med nges pa'i don rtogs pas//
99b1(ngi): phrag dog 'khrugs pa drung nas phyung nas ni// 'bras bu bde ba chen po'i sku brnyes pa'o// khrag dang zhag gi thig les brgyan pa ni// ma mo mkha' 'gro 'bangs
99b2(ngi): su 'khol byas nas// 'dod tshogs khrag gi rgya mtsho bskams nas kyang // 'dod chags 'khrugs pa'i drung nas phyung nas ni// 'bras bu mngon par byang chub
99b3(ngi): sku brnyes pa'o// bskal pa'i me dpung klong na bzhugs pa ni// don dam gnyis med dbyings su rtogs pa'i phyir// ye shes lnga lnga na sku gsum lhun gyis
99b4(ngi): grub// nga rgyal drag po'i phung po bcom nas ni// 'bras bu ye shes chen po'i skye brnyes pa'o// mdzad pa sangs rgyas su la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdud rtsa
99b5(ngi): nyid ni rigs yum gyis// legs par phyogs nas 'dug byas nas// gtso bo la ni mnga' gsol bya// rigs lnga rtsa ba'i de kyi la 'khor nyid// bdag nyid
99b6(ngi): che mchog thugs kha nas// rin chen smug po'i gzhal yas khang // thugs kyi bsnyen pa rdo rje sems// gsung gi bsnyen pa snang mtha' yas// thugs
99b7(ngi): bsnyen bud+d+ha he ru ka/ sku dang gsung dang thugs bsgom pa// bsnyen pa nye ba bsnyen pa che// phyogs bzhi gzungs thag bla ma sa gzung // g.yon brkyang thob srin
100a1(ngi): rdo rje gzung // g.yas pa'i 'phreng ba rgya la gtad// g.yo 'gul med par bslang bar bya// 'dzab ni dbyangs kyi bstod byas
100a2(ngi): nas// dgu pa'i dbyangs la bzlas pa bya// oM AHhU/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i tA hU hri tha/ sku gsung thugs kyi 'phro 'du yis// lus ngag yid gsum
100a3(ngi): sgrib drag nas// yum gyi mkha' la bsgrub pa bya// yum gyi mkha' nas phyir smos pas// snod bcud bdud rtsi slar 'dus nas// nye ba'i bsnyen pa byas
100a4(ngi): nas ni/ bdag rdzas dag pa bsgrub chen thi ma// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi chen po chos nyid gsang ba'i rgyud las// che mchog rtsu ba sbyang ba ste le'u
100a5(ngi): bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba'i don du 'di gsungs so// sbyor sgrol gnyis kyi mchod pa yis// rgyal ba
100a6(ngi): mnyes shing thugs dam bskangs// bar chod byed pa'i nyams len ma// dus tshod shes shing bzlog par bya// ra ga sha ru tra yag sha tshal pa ha na ha na hU phaT/
100a7(ngi): bsgrubs kyang rtags med ga tor ba na// a rni su ti pre du dza/ rig sa drug srog drang bro brdung bskor// dus tshod gang la gtor par dgu// oM AHhU sarba/
100b1(ngi): pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ ha yag+ne wa hu lu hu lu ban d+ha ba na d+ha/ a su she hU hri tha/ srod gung 'jings dang tho ras gros// du sa der dor na ba tsa la byas la// dgug 'dren
100b2(ngi): drag tu byas nas ni// 'dzab drang che ba'i yon tan brjod// slob dpon 'gugs pa'i 'dzab drang zhing // rgyal po bzhi yis khro bo bzhi// dkyil 'khor lnga la
100b3(ngi): 'dzab bskul bya// bar bar dag tu bshags pa bya// dgu pa'i 'dzab ni drangs nas ni// che ba'i yon tan brjod par bya// oM las ye shes 'od 'byung zhing //
100b4(ngi): a gyi sa me sa bsregs thal bar brlags// hU gi sa bdud rtsi re rnam par dag/ sarba sa thams cad dbang du sdud // pa na tsa sa rnam lnga mngon sangs rgyas// a ni
100b5(ngi): skye med chos kyi dbyings// mr-i ni bdud rtsi rnam par dag/ tha sa ni 'khor ba stongs par byed// hU ni thugs kyi sa bon te// hris ni bag chags dbang du sdud//
100b6(ngi): tha ni skye 'chi med pa'o// rtags kyang 'od dud 'phel sgra dri// ya mtshan byung yang bskyed mi bya// de nas bdud rtsi ba skyil bar bya// so so'i mkha' la skyil ba'i
100b7(ngi): sngags/ oM a hU sarba pan tsa amr-ikun d+ha li hU hI tha/ shing dang sman dang rtsi dang nags// sman gyi bsrungs ma bskul bar bya// de nas bdud rtsi dbab pa
101a1(ngi): yang // lha mo brgyad kyis dur khrod sbyang // oM AHsU/ sarba bany+tsa a mr-i ta/ mab+hA be sha ya phebs phebs/ hU r+thiH/ de nas
101a2(ngi): bdud rtsi dbang du bya// oM A hU sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ h+ya 'gris hri/ hu luh+ma lu tri/ pad ma pad mA r+thi/ ban d+ha ban d+ha d+hA hri thA/ rdo rje 'khor lo rin
101a3(ngi): chen dang // pad ma las kyi dbang du bya// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang // dkyil 'khor bzhugs pa'i lha rnams la// 'dzab dang snying po gang thon dbul/
101a4(ngi): skyongs tshigs mchod pa phul nas ni// de tshe myur du dngos grub blang // oM AHhUM sarba pa nu tsa a mr-i ta/ man dzu shri bya ba lo ki te/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi hU~M hriT+Ta
101a5(ngi): rigs 'dzin rta mgrin che mchog dang // mkha' mnyam sku gdung 'byung lnga yum// bdud rtsi dbang chen kun 'du sa nas// che mchog sku gsung thugs yon
101a6(ngi): lAs/ dngos grub dkyil 'khor zhal bsgyur nas// mtshan ma rdzas le blang bar bya'o// oM A hU sarba ban tsa a mr-i ta/ a yu pha la 'gu ya sid+d+hi hU hri tha/
101a7(ngi): oM bo d+hi tsit+ya kA ya bAka tsit+ta sa ma ya s+t+waM// slob dpon rig pa'i me tog dor// sman gyi dkyil 'khor bdag la bstim// rgyal pos bla ma mnga' gsil la/
101b1(ngi): mched kyis 'phreng ba dbul ba dang // slob ma 'jug ceng zhu dbang nod// pho brang sbyor ba zhag dbang bskur la// tshe yi dbang yang ba skur bar bya// thob
101b2(ngi): dang mi tho ba rnam par rtogs// oM AhU sarba pan tsa a mr-i ta/ a b+hi Shiny+tsu hUM hri tha/ o AHhUM sA hA/ a yu pha la 'gu ya a b+hi Shony+tsa hU/ phung po
101b3(ngi): khams dang skye mched yang // ye nas sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin// rang rig sems su rtogs gyur na// spyod yul gang blta sa rang sems gsol//
101b4(ngi): rtogs pa lha ru shes gyur na// lha dang 'du 'bral ye nas med// rnam rtog chos nyid gsal gyur na// dgra bgegs tshar ba cad bya mi dgos// ye 'byams
101b5(ngi): klong gi dbyung rdzogs na// rtags kyi phyag rgya bsgrub mi dgos// 'phrin las bya ba tsal ye 'das na// bsgom bsgrub 'bad rtsol ming yang med// 'di ltar
101b6(ngi): rtogs pa'i gdengs gyur na// bsgrub kyang skyon med btsal ba med// ma bsgrubs skyon med lhun gyis grub// bsam med chos sku nam mkha' 'dra// bsgom
101b7(ngi): med rang 'byung klong nas shar// ye mas byang chub sems rdzogs na// 'du 'dzi byis rtsed ci zhig bya// thabs mkhas rol pa'i ting 'dzin la// tshe chang bsgom
102a1(ngi): bsgrub ci zhig bya// snod bcud thig ler sangs rgyas nas// gzhan nas btsal zhing smin pa med// rtogs pa klong du su 'dris pa/
102a2(ngi): mi zhes bya ba sangs rgyas yin// bcom ldan 'das ni gud na med// gtan g.yo'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya rdzogs// rtog 'dzin sgra mtha' ting 'dzin sngags/
102a3(ngi): 'di ltar spyod pa'i rnal 'byor ni// 'khor 'das yongs rdzogs brdal ba'i sa// sku lnga dbyer med dgongs pa yin// kun bzangs thugs kyi nying khu yin//
102a4(ngi): rgyun tu bsgoms shing bsgrubs byas ma// sil 'byongs na sems ngag lus// mthong snang rmi lam gang du yang // stong gsum nyi mas gang bar mthong /
102a5(ngi): ga pur zla bas gang ba ste// ma sa dur khrod gnas chen na// khrag 'thung bzhugs par gi sal ba dang // rag ta khrag dang dri chur bcas// bder gshegs
102a6(ngi): rigs lnga mthong bar 'gyur// sa ni dri chen chu la thim// chu ni dri chu me la thi ma// ma ni rag ta rlung la thim// rlung ni sha chen nam mkha' thim// nAm
102a7(ngi): mkha' byang sems chos kyi sku// bdud rtsi rnam lngar sangs rgyas so// sku ni yi dam bla ma mchod// gsung ni snying po phyag rgya bzhi// thugs ni gsang ba'i
102b1(ngi): man ngag yin// brdzun sgra dag spang sbyor dang sgrol// bdud rtsi lnga ni dang du blang // nyon mongs mi spang ye shes yin// rigs lnga shes nas kun bsgrub pas//
102b2(ngi): rdo rje rgyal pos rgya bcag la// slob dpon 'dzab bzlas kha phye nas// yum gyis ya mtshan che ba brjod// bdud rtsi pho brang dbyug gang ngo // lha ma bskyang nas gtor ma
102b3(ngi): gtang / gter du rdza dang sbyin sreg bya// mkha' 'gro bskyong la lnga bzla bzlas// gtor ma mthar du dbyung bar bya// lcug chad bshags te drug par
102b4(ngi): tshig gi mtshon mnga' ngan pa bshags// gcig la gcig ni tshangs par bya// dkyil 'khor brdzus la ye shes gshegs// rang yul zhing dang
102b5(ngi): bcas pa dang // bu dang chung ma la sogs de// rang lus phul la yon gyi sa bslu// ci 'byor bla ma mnyes par bya// de ltar bsgoms shing bsgrubs pa yis//
102b6(ngi): sku yi gsang ba bsam mi khyab// chos sku dri ma med pa thob// sku ni thams cad de las byung // gzugs sku gnyis su snang ba'o// gsung gi ga sang ba
102b7(ngi): bsam mi khyab// brjod med don gyi gsung dang ldan// gsung ni thams cad de las byung // gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cur ba sgrog/ thugs kyi gsang
103a1(ngi): khabasam mi khyab/ skye med dgongs pa dbyings na gsal// thugs ni thams cad de las byung // ye shes rnam grangs bsam
103a2(ngi): las 'das// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang gsum// mi bzang brgyan gyis 'khor lo gsal// rtags su dbu yig drug tor bstun// rigs lnga'i
103a3(ngi): sangs rgyas bdud rtsi nyid// rang zhal rang gi lus la mthong // rtsa dbyibs dung chen g.yas su 'khyil// lus khams bdud rtsi spyi gtsug thon// gsang
103a4(ngi): ba'i ring bsrel chen por gnas// rlung gi 'od zer tshangs bug 'phro// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi chen po chos nyid gsang ba'i rgyud las// 'bras
103a5(ngi): bu mthar phyin pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas 'khor rnams kyi sa ston pa la mchod pa mang pos mchod nas 'di skad brjod cing bstod
103a6(ngi): ngo// phun sum tshogs pa gzhi bcas nas// cho ga lnga yis las gzhung bsrang // dkyil 'khor gsum gyis rtog pa sbyangs// gces pa bzhi yis
103a7(ngi): mtha' bsdus nas// 'khor 'das bdud rtsir sbyor mdzad pa// ston pa khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// phyi yi sman bsgrub chen po yis// sems can nyon
103b1(ngi): mongs snang ba sbyangs// nang gi bdud rtsi bsgrub pa yis// rnal 'byor nyams kyi snang ba shar// 'bras bu bde gshegs ldan pa la// mi bzad brgyan gyi
103b2(ngi): 'khor lor grub// snang ba gsum gyis rgyud 'chad pa// ston pa bde gshegs khyod phyag 'tshal// zhes bstod nas/ 'khor rnams ston pas gsungs
103b3(ngi): ba la rjes su yi rangs par gyur to// de nas ston 'khor rnams chos kyi dbyings su thim nas// gsang ba'i rgyud chen po 'di o D+yan gyi yul du dpal du ba nyid
103b4(ngi): pa'i mchod rten nang du bzhugs so// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos 'gro ba la spros so// bdud rtsi chen po chos nyid gsang ba'i rgyud las/ rjes su yi rang
103b5(ngi): bste le'u drug pa'o// // bdud rtsi chen po chos nyid gsang ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhas pa bi ma
103b6(ngi): la mi tA dang / bod kyi lo tsha bag nyags snyan ku ma ras bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ ma hA tan trar
103b7(ngi): tsa a mr-i ta bi na sa nA ma/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal bdud rtsi rol pa ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo//
104a1(ngi): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ longs spyod chen po'i gnas dam par gyur pa de nyid phyogs bcu sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus
104a2(ngi): pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur te/ nyid kyi snang ba yongs su ma 'gags pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mngon par bstod cing / thabs dang shes rab mtha' kun nas grol
104a3(ngi): ba'i mdzod brnyes pas/ yon tan rin po che'i bdag nyid kun nas kun tu chos pa sku sna tshogs dang / gsung sna tshogs dang / thugs sna tshogs tsham tshig pa/ @#/
104a4(ngi): dang yon tan sna tshogs gang shen dang / e/ 'phrin las duH/ gnas rgams/ mtshar dab/ rgyamazin/ yan lag sum brgya drug cu 'a shes sngan sna tshogs kyi sa gzhan las babag shing /
104a5(ngi): khas gsum rnam rgyal/ rnam rgyal/ cho 'phrul che mchog/ gyi bya ba thabs sum brgya drug cu/ mkhas pa'i sgo thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs su gsal bar ston pa de nyid/ bdud rtsi 'argya gargyan chogs pa 'a nga 'og/
104a6(ngi): min gyi gnas lha'i rgyal po'i 'dzin las kyi su bya ba/ khang bzangs dam pa na bzhugs te/ 'od zer gyi snang yan tan/ ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa sna tshogs 'phrul don gnas rig/
104a7(ngi): zhing / dkyil 'khor thams cad rgya phyogs gnas gsum dang gyur/ drug pa rnam268/ kun tu ngan rtogs na/ rgya cher rtags rigapa/ rab rang dag sal sa/ bkod pa mdzad do/ de
104a8(ngi): kha tha la/
104b1(ngi): nyid kyi tshe rna phyog sa bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa kun nas 'dus pa//
104b2(ngi): 'di lta 'khar gyi sdom tshig/ ste/ snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / rigs bsod nams/ rnam 'bras bu ye shes/ par snang ba zhes rgyu'i byang sems/ sprul pa rang rgyung / rang rgyud sprul pa las spyan drangs
104b3(ngi): brgyud bstan pa'i che ba las snang ba dang / rang rgyung ba dag ni gtso ba yin te/ 'khor ni yang la/ bya ba dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i 'khor
104b4(ngi): lo zhes bya ba dang / mdzad pa rgya chen po zhes bya ba dang / pad mo yod pa shang nga bzhin/ zhes bya ste rin chen 'byung ldan/ ba dang / sangs rgyas chub snang ba mtha' yas/ brtsegs pa

104b6(ngi): pra drug pa rdo rje 'chang 'bum gzugs// zhes bya ba dang / shar lho ma mA ki/ mi bskyod pa/ blo/ myo nub/ gros chen po zhes bya ba dang / thams cad tha srung ba zhes rin chen yum/ bya ba byang shar/ las
104b7(ngi): dang las kun byed pa zhes bya ba dang / glang po sde can zhes bya ba dang / ston pa gtso bo dam pa rnams kyis/ snang ba sna tshogs dag rnam par 'phros te/ phyogs
105a1(ngi): bcu'i zhing khams thams cad nye bar bskul zhing / de na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po nye bar g.yo bar

105a4(ngi): 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa kun nas/ sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' tshogs dang bcas pas/

105a6(ngi): dang / rang gi gangan la thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i tshul gyis thams cad longs spyod par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das mchog gi dkyil 'khor na// shin tu
105a7(ngi): rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs// rgyal ba rgya mtsho 'khor dang bcas// skal ldan rnams dang thabs gcig bzhugs// thams cad don kun snang byed pas// phyag
105b1(ngi): rgya'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa'i// 'di ltar ston pa kun snang bas// khyad par chos rnams kun gyi gzhi// rang gi ye shes gnas longs spyod// thabs
105b2(ngi): mchog gsang ba'i de kyi la 'khor nyid// bde chen dgyes la gsang ba'i sku// kun tu bzang po kun gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo yis// da kyi la
105b3(ngi): 'khor kun gnas longs spyod pa'o// gnas mchog yum gyi dkyil 'khor na// gnyis med lhun gyis gnas pa'i tshe// de tshe nyan thos dge 'dun dang //

106a7(ngi): yis kun snang ba// thams cid gsang ba'i thig le cid// byin brlabs ngo mtshar kun gyi gzhi// ston pa'i mthu yis phyogs khyab pa// gsang ba'i bdag thos

106b3(ngi): gsang ba'i gnas kun 'jug/ de nyid phyag rgya ji lta bar// mchod pa bkod tshogs rab 'byams kyis// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas gtso// rang gi

107a1(ngi): rnams bstan pa'i dus// shin tu rgya che 'dir gnas pas// ngo mtshar gsang ba la zhugs mdzod// de nas srungs rgyas thams cad kyi/

107b1(ngi): rdo rje gsang ba'i gral rnams 'khod// mtha' yas stobs rnams zag med bde// rgyal ba kun gyis mchod byas te// rang bzhin bdud rtsi chen po gnas//
