145b4(ngi): mtshams thams cad sprul byas te// rigs kyi khro bo'i rnam sprul pas// phyogs bcu'i bgegs rnams dgug par mdzad// oM ma hA shrI he ru ka sa ma ya hUM/ ma hA kro d+ha na
145b5(ngi): ri a ma oM su b+hi no su b+ha ni hU/ gri ha na gr-i han hU/ gr-i ha na pa ya gr-i ha na pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga ban bi d+yA rA dza ya hUM phaT/ khrag 'thung thugs kyi gsang ba nyid// gas
145b6(ngi): sngags phyag rgya'i tshogs spros pas// phyogs bcu'i bgegs rnams 'joms byed pa'i// khro bo'i rgyal po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dpal chen ye shes rnam 'phrul ltar// zhing
145b7(ngi): khams kun tu las mdzad pa'o// oM badz+ra kro d+ha bi tsa ya hU/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mAn ta ka ha ya grI ba hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kun+da khin+du/ oM badz+ra kro tra ni la dan+da hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha hA
146a1(ngi): a tsa la hU~M/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a bar tsit+ta hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha pad+ma kun Da li hU/ oM badz+ra g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta la hU/ sarba duSh+TAn paT/ badz+ra kI li ki la ya/
146a2(ngi): badz+ra d+ha rod A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya bAg tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya hUM// dkar dang ser dang dmar po dang // ljang ku sngo skya gser gyi mdog/ le brgan ljang sngon mtha
146a3(ngi): ka dang // dmar skya mdog la zhal gsum pa// phyag drug mtshon cha'i tshogs bsnams shing // tho ba rdo rje pad+ma dang // ral gri dbyug pa zhags pa nyid// gtun shing sna tshogs rdo rje dang /
146a4(ngi): rdo rje sdigs mdzub rtse gsum tshogs// rang gi yum bcas rnam par sbyor// thod sbrul ni zla rin chen tshogs// dur khrod rgyun rnams kun gyis 'jigs// rigs kyi lha mo dang bcas
146a5(ngi): ba'o// sprul pas phyogs bcu kun tu gang // 'od 'phros me 'od phyag na mtshon tshe'i tshogs// bgegs kyi rgyal po kun bkug pa'i// chung ma g.yog dang bran bcas dang /
146a6(ngi): rang gi gnas kun dusdus byas te// 'jigs pa'i mtshon chas thams cad 'joms// brgya byin gshin rje la sogs pa'i// 'jigs pa'i tshogs bcas ngu 'bod cing //
146a7(ngi): nyes par spyad pa'i tshogs dran cing // rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas kun 'khod// de dag sprul pa yang sbrul dang // rigs kyi sde dpung tshogs bcas pas// khro rgyal
146b1(ngi): rnam la skyo bas gsol cing // sngags dang phyag rgya 'bul bar byed// dkyil 'khor gsang bar dbang bskur te// dam tshig bstan pa'i dbang gtad cing // phyogs kyi
146b2(ngi): bgegaso rnams 'dul mdzad pa// dam bcas 'phrin las bzhin du spyod// de tshe phyogs bcu'i snang ba'i// rnam rgyal gshin rje gshed po dang // rta mgrin khro bo bdud rtsi
146b3(ngi): 'khyil// dbyug sngon mi g.yo mgon po dang // 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i stobs po che// hUM mdzad pad+ma 'khyil pa la// rang gi dam tshig bstan byed cing // rang gi lus bcas
146b4(ngi): gdan du 'bul// de dag thugs rje chen po yis// bde ba'i ye shes bskyed mdzad cing // rnam par sgrol ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rang gi rigs kyi sangs rgyas 'grub//
146b5(ngi): 'jig rten kun la phan gdags phyir// las bskyes gzugs kyi gnas mdzad cing // gsang sngags gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// bgegs dang 'byung po gzir bar mdzad//
146b6(ngi): brgya byin tshogs bcas gshin rje dang // klu dang gnod sbyin phyogs kyi gdon// me yi bdag po srin po rgyal// rlung dang dbang ldan mtshams kyi bgegs// nyi ma zla ba gza'
146b7(ngi): skar dang // sa bdag lha mo lha min dang // snga dpung blon po dmag dpung bcas// de dag rjes su 'jug byed de// rang gi rgyal po'i rang bzhin gnas// yang ngag ngon gyis ston
147a1(ngi): byed cing // rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gnas rgyas pas// ma 'ongs don phyir bsgrub par mos// de dag rtsom pa'i dkyil 'khor che// 'dren pa'i pad+ma'i
147a2(ngi): dkyil 'khor la// sa bon mtshan ma sngags dang bcas// oM badz+ra kro d+ha tre log kya bi dza ya ma hA sid+d+hi da ra hU/ rdo rje gdams pa las byung ba'i// gung mdzub srin lag rtse gsum
147a3(ngi): bsgreng // mthe bong mthe'u chung bsnol te bsdam// khams gsum rnam rgyal phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor gnas kun brtan byed cing // sbyor bcas dam tshig sngags kyi 'grub
147a4(ngi): rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa las// lag gnyis rtse gsum g.yas dang g.yon// las rnams ma lus kun sbyor ba'i// phyag rgya gsang ba sngags dang bcas// de nas 'dren byed gtso bo'i
147a5(ngi): mchog/ bdud kyi rgyal po'i tshogs 'dus te// tshangs pa khyab 'jug lha chen dang // rgan byed gnas bcu'i bdag po'i tshogs// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul sku ston cing // sde dpung dmag
147a6(ngi): bcas kun tu rgyug/ de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// bde chen gtso la gsol btab cing // de dag gnas tshogs zhi byed pa'i// dkyil 'khor sprul pa kun nas ston// 'bar ba'i
147a7(ngi): dkyil 'khor gru bzhi'i dbus// gtso bo rnam par sprul byas te// thams cad 'od bcas snang ba'i mthus// dkyil 'khor gdan la legs par gnas// rin chen 'bar ba'i khri
147b1(ngi): stengs na// nyi zla pad+mo 'khor lor bcas// gtso bo che mchog he ru ka/ sku mdog smug nag 'bar ba la// nyi shu rtsa gci gzhal ldan cing // bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis phyag gis mdzes//
147b2(ngi): 'jigs pa'i cha lugs khro bo'i bzhin// zhabs brgyad rol pa'i rigs rnams sku// dpal chen yang dag ga da na la bzhugs// rgyu yi ha ru kas brgyan te// zhal gsum phyag drug
147b3(ngi): dkar ba'i mdog/ sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal gnyis mdzes// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang // pad+mo thod pa'i bum pa'i rdzas// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang gos// gtso bo'i zhal rnams sna
147b4(ngi): / tshogs mdog/ 'od bcas rin chen sna lnga'i mdangs// phyag rnams zhi dang khro bo'i// dkyil 'khor gdan bcas sbrul tshogs 'dzin// khro mo dbyings kyi yum chen mo// sngo nag zhal dgu
147b5(ngi): phyag bco brgyad// zhabs brgyad rigs kyi khro bo gnon// bgegs la sogs pa'i gar gyis mdzes// de dag kha dog sna tshogs pa// 'od 'phreng phyag rgya'i mtshan ma dag/ dbyings dang
147b6(ngi): ye shes mnyam par sbyor// rigs lnga khrag 'thung chen po rnams// kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa// sngo na ga dkar ser dmar dang ljang // rang gi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma ni// rigs kyi
147b7(ngi): yum bcas rnams la sbyor// khro bo chen po bcu gnas sbyor// 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro 'phra men dag/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'jigs byed gzugs// 'jigs pa'i rgyan cha kun gyis
148a1(ngi): mdzes/ rang gi rigs tshogs sprul pa'i bcas// sgo bzhi'i khro bo rgyal po dag/ dkyil 'khor kun nas longs spyod pa'o// oM ma hA shri he ru ka/ mahA
148a2(ngi): kro d+hi shwa ri swA d+hu dza/ sa ma ya stam/ dza rU ba ho/ a ra li hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra shri he ru ka/ badz+ra kro d+hi sho rim+b+hi dza/ oM bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka/ bud+d+ha kro d+hi sho ri sto ma dza/ oM rat+na shrI
148a3(ngi): ri he ru ka/ rat+na kro d+hi sho ri sto dza/ oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka/ pad+ma kro d+hi sho ri stau dza/ oM karma shrI he ru ka/ karma kro d+hi sho ri stau dza/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha hU/ ha la ha la ma hA dz+wa la phaT/ oM badz+ra
148a4(ngi): kai'u ri ha/ oM badz+ra tse'u ri ha/ badz+ra pra mo ha/ badz+ra pe ta li ha/ badz+ra pu ka si ha/ badz+ra gA sa ma ri ha/ badz+ra sma na sha ni ha/ badz+ra tsan d+ha li he/ badz+ra sing nga mu ka he/ badz+ra
148a5(ngi): bya tri mu kha he/ badz+ra shI la mu ka he/ badz+ra sho na mu ka he/ badz+ra kang ka mu ka he/ badz+ra kha kha mu kha he/ badz+ra hu lu mu kha he/ badz+ra ar+ya te tsa teng dza hU phaT/ badz+ra lo ka ba hU phaT
148a6(ngi): badz+ra pa smi pa la ya pa ho hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ ha la ha la ha la/ phaT phaT phaT/ ye shes 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// phyogs bcu'i gnas nas kun spros te// khams gsum
148a7(ngi): dregs byed tshogs rnams kun// rang gi gnas su rgyal bar mdzad// kun nas 'jigs pa'i nga ro dang // zhum tshig sgra rnams 'don byed cing // sngar bcas dpung dang mgon med pa//
148b1(ngi): nye bar smin pa'i gnas su 'khod// de tshe che mchog dkyil 'khor tshogs// phyogs bcu kun tu rnams spros pas// zhing khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// dregs byed tshogs
148b2(ngi): kun bcom byas te// rang gi rgyu 'bras dran rdzogs bskyed// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// gnyis med rdo rje chen po 'di// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor gnas gsal bas//
148b3(ngi): 'gro rnams nyon mongs gnas su sbyong // nye bar sbyor ba'i rkyen rnams kyis// bdud rtsi chen po'i gnas rgyas so// 'di dag nye bar spyod pa'i mthus// rang gi don kun gsal bar byed//
148b4(ngi): de nas sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems kun yi rang ste// ma 'ongs rnal 'byor don gyi phyir// ngo mtshar rmad byung nye bar zhus// rang gi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin du// rang
148b5(ngi): gi bsgrub pa rgya chen kun// de dag nye bar bsgrub pa'i// bsnyen bsgrub phyag rgya'i tshogs 'jug pa// 'phrin las kun tu bstan byed pa'o// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// phyag
148b6(ngi): rgya chen po gsal byas pas// ljags la sa nu he ru ka/ mtshan ma yi ges rab sbyor zhing // snying po phyag rgya sngags dang bcas// oM shri ma hA kA ya su ka he ru ka si ti dar gnya' nA gar pa
148b7(ngi): bcings pa bstan byas te// drug cing bcing rje/ yangangs gyu mings mdzangs/ 'brel gamim chod// dmatshig can po sa rgyas// sa kyi
149a1(ngi): 'khor bstan par mdzad// rdo rje khu tshur las byung ba'i// thabs dang shes rab skur ston pa'o// de nas bdud dang dregs byed rnams// phyogs rnams
149a2(ngi): kun nas sdud byed cing // sku gsung thugs kyi rnam 'phrul gyis// rang rang gnas su nges par bsgral// yi nas rgyu nyid dag pa la// nga dang bdag tu bzung ba'i blos// 'khor ba'i
149a3(ngi): / gnas kun rnam par 'phrul// khams gsum de dag bsgral ba'i zhing // oM ma hA a tsa la sa ma ya d+ha ra ma d+hA tu swa b+hA wa Ad ma ko&ha/ mi g.yo phyag rgya chen po'i ngang // chos kyi sku las
149a4(ngi): bzhengs nas kyang // mi rtog thugs rje chen po yis// khams gsum las kun rnam par zhi// 'tshe ba'i bdag po tshe dang srog/ thugs rje che dang shes rab dang // thabs la mkhas
149a5(ngi): pa'i byin brlabs kyis// 'gro ba mtha' dag sbyong bar mdzad// bdud dang gshin rje 'khor bcas kun// gnyis med rol pa'i phyag rgya yis// thams cad gcig char bsgral byas te//
149a6(ngi): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor che gnas sbyor// oM swa b+ha ba ba pa kar d+he d+ha sa si stau/ ma ha ku ru ni hUM dza dza/ dregs byed rnams kyi rnam shes dag/ nges par gzugs la phab nas ni// mkha'
149a7(ngi): 'gro'i zhal ni nub tu bstan// phyag rgya bzhi yis 'grub par byed// gnas kyi sgo 'di su yis gcod// sems kyi bdag pos bcad dam ci// gzung 'dzin ka lag bsnol ba'i tshogs//
149b1(ngi): yul las 'das pa'i don gyis dbye// oM ka ta ka ri ka na d+ha kan pra be sha phaT/ 'byung ba'i sgo rnams gcad byas nas// bad gshegs thugs rjes khyab par mdzad// dregs byed ma rungs
149b2(ngi): lha chen rnams// sems kyi sgo bcad rnams 'byed cing // rdo rje 'bar ba spu gri yis// nyon mongs rgyun bcas gcod byed cing // sems kyi gnas kun gzung bar mdzad// mgo ni lho nub
149b3(ngi): mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar gnyis su brkyang // ta ki rngom brjid 'bar ba yis// zhabs kyi dkyil 'khor kun gnon cing // bgegs dang 'byung po gzir ba'i tshul// rdo rje drag
149b4(ngi): bo rta gang bcas// oM ma ha sa ma ya ki sha tsi ta dz+wa la hUM phaT/ khams gsum nas byung sems can gnas// rdo rje sku yis khyab par gyis// 'od zer tshul du bsdus nas ni// de dag
149b5(ngi): bdag gis lus la gzung // spros pa rdo rje sna tshogs kyis// sku gnas ye shes mchog tu sbyor// thar pa'i lam 'byed dkyil 'khor 'dir// skal ldan blo la 'jug pa ltar// drags
149b6(ngi): byed lha chen tshogs sogs nas// rang bzhin bde chen gnas su sbyor// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yis// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du// thugs rje chen po'i kun sgrol zhing //
149b7(ngi): zhing khams gnas kun rnam dag sbyor// chos nyid skye 'gags med pa las// bde bar gshegs pa 'gro ba'i chos// gnyis ma dbyings su gcig pa'i rgyu// sku yi ngo bo mnyam pa nyid/
150a1(ngi): thams cad snying po byang chub sems// ma skyes pa na 'gag pa 'jig/ bdag nyid med na mnyam pa'i sku// thugs rje chen po tsor mi mdzad// ye nas de ltar
150a2(ngi): gnas bzhin du// sems can ma rig rmongs pa'i blos// bdag dang gzhan gyi so sor 'dzin// rtag chad mtha' rnams rnam spangs pas// 'khrul pas bstan pa'i phung po lnga// log
150a3(ngi): rtog phyin ci log gis bcings// nyon mongs sdug bsngal rgyu ba sags te// 'khor ba'i 'bras bcas kun tu spyod// mya ngan 'das sogs mthar phyin pas// phung po khams dang skye
150a4(ngi): mched rgyun// dag dang ma dag gnyis kyi chos// bde 'gro 'alam la sgrib byed rnams// rtog pa'i mtshan ma kun sbyor ba'i// mi rtog ye shes gnyen po'i chos// oM ma hA ma
150a5(ngi): ta sarba s+pha ta ga te ga te hU hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa pa tsa swa nir rgya ga te he ruM hUM phaT/ oM d+ha ha d+ha sarba na ra ga te he du ma hU phaT/ ye shes 'bar ba'i mes bsregs te// mtshan med
150a6(ngi): ston pas rnam par dag/ thugs rje chen po'i byini brlabs kyis// sku yi sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed// gsung gi mtha' yas sems can sgrol// thugs mchog tshad med
150a7(ngi): bzhi dang ldan// nyi zla gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// tshe dpag med pas dbang bskur te// yang dag nyid las yang dag sgrol// yang dag sgrol nas bde chen thob// mi ldog
150b1(ngi): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du// rgyal ba'i zhing khams rnam par dag/ oM oM hU swA hA/ las bzhi ye shes lcags kyu yis// 'gro gnas gsang bar hUM gis bsdus/ byin
150b2(ngi): brlabs ye shes sku spros te// dbyings dang ye shes lhun grub pa'o// sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byams kyi// bde gshegs pho brang kun sbrul zhing // rdzu 'phrul yan lag
150b3(ngi): kun ldan pas// 'phag sa lam brgyad tshogs gnas kun sgrol// rigs kyi sangs rgyas kun gshegs te// chos kyi 'khor lo la sogs spyod// 'jig rten lha bcas gtso
150b4(ngi): bo dang // nyan thos rang rgyal dgra bcom rnams// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs// phyag 'tshal yang dag mchod cing bstod// stug po bkod pa'i sa 'das
150b5(ngi): nas// rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rgyas// stong gsum ma lus ston byas pas// 'bum gyi char yang mi phod de// skyes bu chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis// bsgral ba 'ba'
150b6(ngi): zhig snying rje'i mchog/ bdud dang dbang phyug gshin rje bdag/ thugs rje tshad med bzhi pasgral nas// ro yi nyal thabs gan rgyal te// 'dzam gling lho yi rgyal khams su// bor
150b7(ngi): mas sa gzhir gyur pa ni// dur khrod chen po brgyad du glags// mgo ni lho phyogs gnas su bstan// lag gnyis g.yas dang g.yon du brkyang // mgo dang lus gnyis yan ma
151a1(ngi): kun// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// rang byung sprul pa'i lha mo gnas// de dag byin brlabs byung bar mthus// mchod rten shing la gas
151a2(ngi): bar snang // 'di ltar sa gzhi de dag kun// bkra shis thugs rje la mtshan can// chos dang dngos grub 'byung ba'i gnas// cho 'phrul rol par bstan pa'o// de mi lus snying mag
151a3(ngi): ma mo chen mo ke'u ri gnas// mkhas shing sring stobs che ba'i yul// khyad par chos kyi tshogs rgyas shing // mchod rten bde byed gzhon nu nyid// mgo ni lho phyogs gnas pa'i/
151a4(ngi): dur khrod chen pa bar snang byed// sing nga yul gyi glang bran dag/ ma mo chen mo tse'u ri'i gnas// mthong thos rnam pa'i 'phrul bag can// mchod rten ri bo ta la yin// lag pa
151a5(ngi): g.yas pa shar lho mchims// dur khrod chen po bal po'i yul// ma mo chen mo bu ka si// lhag par zas kyi longs spyod che// mchod rten khri da kar sti// rab tu sprul pa snang byed
151a6(ngi): bya'o// lag pa g.yon pa lho nub mtshams// dur khrod chen pos la'i yul// ma mo man mo kAs mA gri// phyagan rdo rje dbang gi gnas// mthu ngadu rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas pas// rgyang
151a7(ngi): kyi mchod rten sngon 'phags pas// rkang pa g.yas pa byang shar mtshams// dur khrod chen po li yi yul// ma mo chen mo tsan d+ha li// ma dang chu 'i rdzu 'phrul can// mchod can ming
151b1(ngi): nimyu gu'i tshogs// ma mo sngags rnams kun 'grub gnas// rkang pa g.yon pa nub byang mtshams// dur khrod chen po rab snang yul// ma mo chen mo sma sha ni// bde skyid ldan pa phun
151b2(ngi): sum tshogs// mchod rten ming ni ka ni ka/ mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kun rgyu ba'i gnas// mtshan ma'i gnas te byang phyogs gnas// dur khrod chen po u ta'i gnas// ma mo chen mo
151b3(ngi): be ta li/ 'byor pa'i longs spyod lnga dang ldan// dngos grub can yang de na mang // mchod rten chos kyi 'khor lo'o// de yi nang rol thams cad kun// dur khrod chen po'i nub phyogs
151b4(ngi): spungs// rgya mtsho gling gi gnas chen po// lang ka pur srin po'i yul// ma mo chen mo bra mo ha// rin chen nor dang dpag bsam shing // 'byor pa'i longs spyod kun dang ldan// mchod
151b5(ngi): rten grub pa'i dngos grub can// thams cad sku la dbang sgyur ba'o// de ltar sgrol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs//
151b6(ngi): rang gi rigs bcas dkyil 'khor nyid// dus gsum rgyal ba'i bka' bzhin du// byin brlabs bstan pas kun spyod cing // sngags mchog bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i phyir// dam rdzas
151b7(ngi): brgyad rnams bstan par bya// sangs rgyas kun tu 'grub byed pa'i// dam tshig chen po mchog gi rdzas// pradz+nyA ke sa tsau tuM dzA ma hUM phaT/ ma nu dar mangs/ u ma dzadza ma ma ha maM tra/ khA hi khANi
152a1(ngi): hU phaT e e h+ya phyi ma ha ka ru tra sha tru/ ka ra ba ta ni hUM phaT/ thugs rje chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// dur khrod bdag po kun 'dus te// mchod rten
152a2(ngi): gtso dang rigs bcas rnams// rang gi snying po 'bul bar byed// drag po'i chung ma dbang phyug tshogs// kau shu rtsa brgyad g.yog dang bcas// dkyil 'khor chen por dbang thob nas/
152a3(ngi): dam bcas las bzhin rnam par bkod// de nas bcom ldan kun tu bzang // rigs rnams thams cad zhi byed pas// dkyil 'khor thams cad rab bsdus pa'i// sku ni smug nag
152a4(ngi): 'bar ba la// phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs// rab tu 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor las// rigs tshogs sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed// bdud tshogs dregs byed chung mar
152a5(ngi): bcas// thug rjes rigs 'dzin dbang bskur nas// dam tshig bstan pa la gnas mdzad// phyogs rnams kun nas smras pa'i tshig/ rang gi dam bcas sdom par byed// rdo rje 'bar ba'i
152a6(ngi): me dpung 'dis// bskal pa'i me rnams 'joms par byed// 'jigs tshul rngam pa'i khyad par can// dbu mang rtsub pa'i tshig sgrogs shing // phyag na 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha
152a7(ngi): thogs// zhi ba phyag stong spyan stong tshogs// 'jig rten khams kun sla bkod byed// khro gnyer rab tu 'bar ba'i skus// 'jig rten dregs tshogs smos ci dgos// sgeg pa dpa'
152b1(ngi): bo 'jigs su rung // rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed// snying rje bsngags dang zhi bar ston// 'bar ba'i mtshon cha sna tshogs can// 'jig rten thal bar rlog mdzad pa'i//
152b2(ngi): e ma ho che mchog he ru ka/ khro rgyal khro la skyabs su mchi// thugs rje nan tan ma bzung ngam// gal te bka' ltar ma bgyis na// mgo lus snying dag brgyar 'gas shing // rab
152b3(ngi): tu 'bar bas sreg par mdzod// de nas de dag thams cad kyis// che mchog 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// rjes su bsgrub pa'i don phyir zhus// yang dang yang du gsol bta ba ste//
152b4(ngi): e ma ho ston pa khyod nyid kyis// yang dag mdzad pa rgya chen po// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams kyi phyir// thugs rje dag pas bstan par mdzod// 'di dag sngon du sa ci bzhin du//
152b5(ngi): ston pas bstan pa'i don ga sa la mdzad// dkyil 'khor chen po 'bar ba'i// khang pa gru bzhi sgo bzhis brgyan// sna tshogs rin chen rta ba bas tshogs// nyi zla me tog 'phreng
152b6(ngi): bas brgyan// 'dod pa'i yon tan lha mo'i sprin// rdo rje rin chen ba dan las// snyan pa'i dril bu phyogs bcur sgrogs// ra ba rdo rje pad+mas brgyan// pho brang dkyil 'khor dbus
152b7(ngi): gnas pa// dur khrod 'bar ba'i ge zhal yas khang // dus gsum dkyil 'khor rgya chen tshogs// phyogs bcu kun nas 'khrigs pa'i// zhing sbrul thod pa'i 'phreng bas brgyan//
153a1(ngi): mtshon cha sna tshogs me 'od 'bar// dbu yi dkyil 'khor phyogs dang mtshams// rin chen sna lnga'i mdangs bcas par// re'u cha brgyad pa'i 'phreng bas
153a2(ngi): mdzes// 'khor lo pad+ma rin chen dag/ ku ba'i cha brgyad phyogs dang mtshams// kun nas yongs su bskor ba'i// glu chang bar khyams sgo khyud can// dar dang me tog rin chen
153a3(ngi): tshogs// dur khrod rdzas rnams sna tshogs kyis// rang gi gnas bcas tA ra Na// pa tra'i 'phreng bas kun klubs pa'o// rnam mdzes 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyis brgyan// 'khor
153a4(ngi): lo chen po'i dkyil 'khor dbus// kun bzang yab yum rol pa'i mthus// sems can sna tshogs phyogs dang mtshams// rang gi phyogs stong rgyal po tshogs// gnas rnams
153a5(ngi): kun nas legs bkug ste// dkyil 'khor ba stan pa'i gnas su bkod// gsang sngags mthu las rab 'phrul pa'i// ye shes khro bo bcu po rnams// yum dang gnyis med sbyor
153a6(ngi): mdzad cing // rang gi 'phrin las kun spyod pas// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed// rin chen ka ba mchog brgyad kyis// nyi zla pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la// rigs
153a7(ngi): kyi bde gshegs yum dang bcas// phyogs mtshams dbus su brten 'gyur ba'i// sprul pa yang sprul dkyil 'khor tshogs// sku mdog mtshan ma rims bzhin bkod// kun kyang
153b1(ngi): zhal gsum phyag drug la// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum 'bar ba'i stobs// 'jigs byed brgyan cha'i cha lugs dang // khro bo 'bar ba'i gar bcas pa'o// rin chen nyi zla'i
153b2(ngi): gang na bzhugs pa'o// kro d+hi shwa ri dbyings kyi yum// sku mdog sngo nag dbu dgu pa// bco brgyad phyag bcas zhabs brgyad mdzes/ khade gshegs rigs lnga he ru ka/ yum
153b3(ngi): bcas gnon thabs gar gyi sa bzhugs// khro bo dbyings kyi dbang phyag dang // che mchog khro mo mnyam sbyor bas// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzhi bcu gnyis// zhabs brgyad smag nag
153b4(ngi): 'jigs pa'i tshul// rin chen rgyan tshogs chas rnams dang // dur khrod gnas kyis rnam par brjid// phyi rol ma tshogs mkha' 'gro rnams// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas kun
153b5(ngi): // sprul pa yang sbrul tshogs bcas 'khor// 'gra men sgo ba khro ba'i tshigs// phyogs rnams kun tu khyab pa'i// dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa chen por sbyor// rigs rnams
153b6(ngi): kun gyis dbang bskur zhing // byin brlabs sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ dkyil 'khor bdun gyi brjid pa'i sku// sbyor ba brgyad kyi bdag nyid can// rab tu rdzogs pas gsal
153b7(ngi): byas te// zhing khams chen po spro mdzad cing // phyag rgya chen gnas rnal 'byor pas// sangs rgyas kyi kun bdag nyid do// khams gsum thams cad bskal ba'i zhing // rgyu drug
154a1(ngi): gnas pa'i sems can rnams// bsdus pa'i sbyor ba kun bsdus nas// mi ldog dbyings su yang dag nyid// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun gsal bas//
154a2(ngi): thig le chen pos dbang bskur mdzad// zla gsang dbus na byang chub sems// rdzogs sangs rgyas la som nyi med// sha chen bshang gci khu ba dag/ bde gshegs rigs lnga'i
154a3(ngi): sa bon gyis// rnam par dri chen snang bar mdzad// phyi rol chen po lnga dag pas// nang gi rgyu 'bras ye nas dag/ chos dbyings ye shes ngo bo nyid// mi bskyod byang chub sems/
154a4(ngi): nyid de// dmigs med ye nas dag pas na// ma sa rin chen 'byung ldan gtso// mnyam dang mi mnyam dbyer med dngos// snang ba rag ta mtha' yas thugs// skye 'gag med
154a5(ngi): pa ye nas dag/ don yod dri chu la sa grub pa// kun kyang gtsang zhing dri ma med// thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas lnga// ma lus rdzogs pa'i ye shes nyid// ma bcos ye
154a6(ngi): nas lhun gyis grub// de phyir sman chen bcud kyi mchog/ bdud rtsi zhes ni rigs la bya// rtogs pa'i klong du su 'dris pa// mi zhes byas pa sangs rgyas yin// bcom ldan
154a7(ngi): 'das ni gud na med// 'byung ba lnga las rgyud lnga rgyu// sprul pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas nyid// rang gi lus la bsdus pa'i phyir// sku gsung rdo rje dbang thob nas// bsgrub pa'i
154b1(ngi): rdzas su rnam par spyod// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal bdud rtsi rol pa las/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'du mdzad pa ste rim par phye ba bzhi pa'o// /
154b2(ngi): / de nas rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun 'dus shing // thabs dang shes rab sgral spyod pas// de dag dkyil 'khor
154b3(ngi): mnyes par mdzad// de tshe 'khor gyi byang chub sems// rdo rje chos kyi bskul mdzad cing // yang dag rdzogs pa'i thabs 'di dag/ dkyil 'khor gnas kun 'jug par
154b4(ngi): dgongs// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo nyid// bde chen bstan pa'i thugs rje yis// bsgrub pa gsang ba'i las kun dag/ byin brlabs mthu yis ston par mdzad//
154b5(ngi): sngon du yun ring tshogs ba sogs pa'i// rnal 'byor chen po'i las thabs can// yon tan rigs rnams kun ldan pa'i// mdangs dga' mchog tu gyur par bsngags//
154b6(ngi): dad cing rgya chen shes rab kyis// brtson pas yang dag sgrub par byed// de nyid yang dag snyan pa'i snod // rnal 'byor chen po'i mtshan nyid ldan// yang dag bla mas dbang
154b7(ngi): bskur cing // yang dag dam tshig la gnas pas// yang dag sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs// yang dag bslab pa brtson par bya// bde ba chen po'i sa gzhi dag/ kun nas
155a1(ngi): rnam par brgyan pa'i gnas// nyes pa'i tshogs bral mdangs ldan pa// bar chad bgegs kyi gnod med par// phyi nang tshul bzhin sbyangs pa dang /
155a2(ngi): srang dang bsrung dang byin gyis brlabs// yang dag ye shes bstan 'gyur ba'i// sa gzhi zab mo byin brlabs pa'i// mchod dang gtor ma rgya chen tshogs// de dag sngags dang
155a3(ngi): phyag rgya'i mthus// nyes par spyad pa'i las rnams dag/ thams cad dngos grub byed pa'o// ri rtsa nyams dga' mdangs bzang ba'i// yid 'ong gnas su 'dug nas ni// byin
155a4(ngi): brlabs mtshams bcad brtan par gnas// lha'i tshogs bcas thun mong dang // khyad par rnam par rol pa'i// bder gshegs byin brlabs lha mor bcas// mang du 'dus
155a5(ngi): pas kun mnyes mdzad// dkyim 'khor bzang po'i gnas brgyan te// rigs rnams bkod pa kun sbrul zhing // lhag pa'i gyur bcas ma 'dres rnams// rang gi 'phrin las
155a6(ngi): mthu las 'phrul// ye shes dkyil 'khor dgu bya ste// cho ga'i yan lag kun rdzogs pas// sta gon gnas mchog bkra shis par// rigs can dkyil 'khor brtan
155a7(ngi): par gnas// rdzas kyi tshogs kun sbyang ba dang // byin brlabs 'dod pa'i don bzhin du// thams cad longs spyod yon tan lnga// dkyil 'khor gnas kyi don bsgrub pa'i// thams
155b1(ngi): cad brgyan dang khrus rnams kyis// phyi nang nye bar mdzes byas te// phyag 'tshal sdig bshags la sogs rgyud// de kun bstan pas rnam par dag/ rdo rje rgyal po rgyal theb che//
155b2(ngi): shes rab phyag rgya 'khor rnams gsum// sems bskyed sdom pa la gnas shing // dbang dang dam tshig rdzogs byas te/ bya ba chen po las mthar phyin// dkyil 'khor mda' gang
155b3(ngi): grubazhi la// dri sna lnga yi byug pas brgyan// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad// re'u cha brgyad pa'i gzhung bzhin palta// de'i tshe ma mo brgyad la yang // yid bzhin nor
155b4(ngi): bu 'bar ba bri// dkyil 'khor dbus su dgod pa'i rdzas// srid gsum ban d+ha bzang gong yug/ ye nas ma bcos rang bzhin snod// dpal dang ldan pa'i snod bzhag la// gnas
155b5(ngi): de nyid dgod pa'i sman// ye nas rang byung bdud rtsi lnga// sha chen bshang gci khu ba khrag/ dag pa'i rgyu ste bdud rtsi dngos// stong las sbyor ba sa ye nas dag/ pho brang rin chen gzhal
155b6(ngi): yas khang // gru bzhi sgo khyud rta babs brgyan// phyogs rnams kun tu gsal ba'i// rin chen kha dog rnam lnga la// ba dan dril bus rnam par klubs// bla bre'i tshogs rnams rnam
155b7(ngi): par 'brel// sna tshogs rdo rje'i sa gzhi la// 'khor lo nyi zla pad+ma sa brgyan// klu chang bar khyams sgo khyud dang // 'dod yon lha mo 'khrigs pa'o// dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas
156a1(ngi): rnams su// kun bzang ye shes gsang ba'i bsngags// A li kA li gsang ba'i rgyun// yig 'bru 'od dpung phyag rgya'i tshogs// rigs kyi dkyil
156a2(ngi): 'khor kun bdag nyid// 'phro 'du brtan pa'i don spyod pa'o// bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor kun rgyas pa'o// gtso bo zhal gsum phyag drug pa// ljang ser dkar dang dmar bas
156a3(ngi): mdzes// dbu rgyan rin chen sman rnams dang // na bza' kun gyis rnam par klubs// rdo rje rgyar ma bdud rtsi'i snod// nor bu rin chen pad+mo dang // rtse gsum be con mtshan ma thogs// mtsha
156a4(ngi): dpe cha lugs yum rnams dang // zhi dang khro ba cas gnyis ka'i tshul// rang 'od yum dang mnyam sbyor te// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rigs rnams spro// dbang bskur rigs kyi bdag
156a5(ngi): pos brgyan// sku gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs dang // 'od tshogs sprul pa kun spyod pa'o// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// dkyil 'khor gsal ba la gnas te// rang
156a6(ngi): sngags phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams kyis// phyogs bcu'i bdud rtsi rdzogs par mdzad// rdo rje rin chen pad+mo dang // bde gshegs rigs kyi khro rgyal bzhi// dkar sdod mar dang ser
156a7(ngi): ba'i mdog/ zhal gsum g.yas g.yon rnam par 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen pad+mo dang // 'khor lo bdud rtsi bum pa nyid// rgya ram ral gri dgra sta dang // rin chen 'phreng bcas
156b1(ngi): yum dang 'khril// phyi rol mchod pa'i longs spyod brgyan// lha mos gnas kun mdzes byas pas// rgya cher rnam par spro zhing bsdu// phyogs bcu kun nas 'khrigs pa'o// /
156b2(ngi): sgo srungs rigs kyi khro bo dag/ zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs byed brgyan// da ka ra ser dmar dang ljang ku'i mdog/ tho ba dbyug pa pad+mo dang // rtse gsum bdud rtsi
156b3(ngi): bum pa nyid// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dri le// sna tshogs rdo rje'i 'phreng ba 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi sa dbang bskur ba'i// rigs bcas mtshan ma sa mdzes
156b4(ngi): byas pa'o// oM a mr-i ta kun DA li ma hA shrI he ru ka hUM/ kar ma kro d+ha sho ri swA hA/ oM bi sha badz+ra he ru ka hU/ ka ra ma badz+ra kro d+ho sho ri swA hA/ oM bi sha rat+na he ru ka hUM/ kar
156b5(ngi): ma rat+na kro d+hi sho ri swA hA/ oM bi sha pad+ma he ru ka hUM/ ka ra ma kro d+hi sho ri swA hA/ oM bi sha bu ta shri he ru ka hU/ ka ra ma tsa kra kro d+hi sho r-i swA hA/ badz+ra a gu sha swA hA/
156b6(ngi): a mr-i ta ra d+ha kro d+ha hU/ rat+na pa sha hAM/ rat+na au a mr-i te pad+ma kro ha hU/ pad+ma s+pho ta ba ma swA hA/ au a mr-i ta pu ta kro d+ha hUM/ bu ta ga na d+he sha ri swA hA//
156b7(ngi): / rigs rnams rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dag/ phyag rgya bzhi'i brtan par gnas// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rigs kun gyi// bdud rtsi mtshan ma rgya ra ma bcas//

157a6(ngi): rnams phyag rgya sngags kyis sbyar// de nas 'jam dpal rnon po nyid// rang gi 'khor tshogs sder bcas pas// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal mchod// de dag bstan pa'i

157b1(ngi): pa dang // gnyis med dngos grub ma nyam sbyor bas// rigs kun 'bras bu ji ltar 'grub// de nas kun tu bzang po nyid// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs te// snang ba'i

159b1(ngi): bas na/ dri med rnam dag ye shes sku// rag ta chags med dmar bas na// chos rnams kun spyod pad+mo'i sku// sha chen yid bzhin rin chen sngo// sna tshogs 'byung gnas
